title: Website Designer
description:
Job Description: 
We are looking for a talented and innovative website designer to join our team. As a website designer, your role will involve creating visually stunning and user-friendly websites. Your key responsibilities will include designing website layouts, selecting captivating color schemes, and developing captivating graphics and illustrations. A deep understanding of user experience (UX) design principles and proficiency in industry-standard design software are essential. Attention to detail and the ability to meet project deadlines are crucial. The ideal candidate will possess a portfolio exhibiting their previous website design projects.

Key Skills:
- Proficiency in using Adobe Creative Suite or Figma
- Strong knowledge of UX / UI principles
- Familiarity with responsive design
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills

upworkfreelancer.name: Alexander T.
upworkfreelancer.title: Lead Web Designer & Developer | Over 300 Projects Completed

work_histories.title: WordPress Developer Needed for Custom Website Creation
work_histories.client_feedback: "That was great. Thank you. Alexander is an excellent developer. We had urgent tasks that needed to be completed by the end of the week, and despite the hard requirements, Alexander quickly got to the heart of the task and delivered outstanding results. His efficiency and expertise were impressive, and we look forward to further cooperation with him. Highly recommended!"
work_histories.description:
We are seeking an experienced WordPress developer to assist us in the development of our website. Unlike typical WordPress projects, our website does not rely on basic themes or page builders. We require someone with expertise in customizing WordPress themes and plugins to create a unique and fully responsive website experience.

About: The website will offer users the ability to select customized service packages based on their chosen building type. Features include options for text customization or professional copywriting services, brochure creation, photography services (including drone shots), as well as promotion and advertising functionalities.

We recently got a grant so we are looking for a reliable partner who will provide development and technical support for many years.

Responsibilities:
-Implement functionality to schedule appointments and accept payments.
-Develop simple and flexible CMS
-Create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that align with our branding guidelines.

Requirements:
-Experience in WordPress web development.
-Strong understanding of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
-Ability to work independently and collaboratively with our team.
-Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality work.
If you are a talented WordPress developer with a passion for creating custom solutions, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work and explain how your skills align with our project requirements.

work_histories.title: Looking for WooCommerce Variants Expert for complex Products for 1-2h consulting call
work_histories.description: We are looking for a WooCommerce Variants Expert for 1-2 hours of consulting. We have complex products with lots of options and are looking for the best solution in terms of performance and customer usability. Also the products incl. variants need to be uploadable via csv. Please find attached an example product.  It has color categories 2,4, 6, 7 and 9 for the shell. Behind those categories are around 81 individual colors. For those colors there are 5 different bases. Resulting in at least 400 variants.  Please describe shortly how you would build this in woocommerce, then we can discuss details in a short consulting call.

work_histories.title: Wordpress Developer - Custom Theme + ACF
work_histories.client_feedback: "Thanks!"
work_histories.description:
I'm looking for a Wordpress Developer to turn my mockups from Adobe XD into custom pages on my website via Advanced Custom Fields. And help with maintenance or other tasks related to the website.

My website: www.NickKolenda.com

work_histories.title: Website developer needed to launch a new online venture
work_histories.client_feedback: "It's been a pleasure to work with the team. They were very responsive to our needs, and executed the project in line with our vision which was very impressive. Easy to deal with and work very efficiently - highly recommend!"
work_histories.description:
We're looking to enlist the support of a full-stack developer to launch our venture, which is to provide VPN services to our customers. 

Responsibilities:  
- Designing and implementing features, functionality, and layout for the webpages
- Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects
- Helping formulate an effective, responsive design and turning it into a working theme
- Optimising website for SEO
- Building website in Wordpress, including payment integration and integration to the end VPN product  

Requirements:  
- Previous experience using WordPress
- Good understanding of front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery
- Knowledge of SEO research and best practices (not required)
- Experience building user interfaces for websites and/or web applications
- Experience designing and developing responsive design websites
- Comfortable working with debugging tools like Firebug, Chrome inspector, etc.
- Previous experience of using WooCommerce, or other payment integrations
- Browser extensions required
- Any experience integrating with centralised identity stores is helpful

Example websites we would like to take inspiration from: Surfshark, ExpressVPN

We have a rough sitemap which we can share following initial discussions

work_histories.title: Move Wordpress site to new host
work_histories.description:
We need to move our Wordpress site to a new host.  We have a new hosting account with Bluehost.  When we move to the new host, we need to confirm that the e-commerce function of the site is working, Google Analytics is set up, name records update, and that the form submission page gets updated to prevent a bunch of bots from submitting forms.  

We'd like to update the look of the site to a cleaner modern look that matches our marketing material.  Please advise is if that is best done through a template or another method.  Our website is www.westernstateshemp.com. 

Once the initial job is complete, we have monthly ongoing requests that we'd like to have an ongoing contract open for.  

Please submit previous work and sites you have done.

work_histories.title: Tweaks to current esports affiliate site
Wordpress developer needed to build custom search facility including associated backend database
work_histories.client_feedback: "Zero complaints, absolutely fantastic in all areas. My project was delivered on time and within budget. The platform built is robust with the exact functionalities required. Communication was first class and the team were accessible at all points of the engagement. The attention to detail and awareness of the overall project goals meant I was gladly challenged on my specification to ensure the best possible outcome."
work_histories.description:
We are working on an esports betting website that seeks to match gamers with bookmakers based on a small set of criteria.

We need an experienced Wordpress developer to help us build the frontend search facility and associated backend database/functionality.

The final deliverables would be:
- a responsive search facility sitting on our homepage
- a responsive table of results on a results page with the ability to amend search criteria
- search criteria from the current search made available to pre-fill fields in a "pop-up" registration form - this data would then be stored on the user's record

We have a brand, logo, URL and Wordpress theme installed and ready. We are in the process of customising the theme for our purposes, using Elementor.

At this time, the brief for this job is purely to build the search facility from a functionality point of view. We are aiming to style the frontend ourselves, although if it'd be beneficial for our developer to do this that may be acceptable too depending on costs/times.

Internally, we have good experience working with Wordpress from an Editor perspective and some WP backend and frontend dev experience. We also have an in-house designer.

Fuller specs will be provided to the successful developer.

work_histories.title: Wordpress architect consultancy
work_histories.client_feedback:
"Alexander consulted me what is a best way to build my network of comparison websites. During the call he answered all my questions and proposed some new ideas I never thought of. 
I can recommend Alexander as a very professional Wordpress developer and a great communicator!
Will definitely hire him to develop my websites once the designs are ready."
work_histories.description:
Hi!
I'm looking for a top-notch Wordpress / PHP developer for a consultancy on architecture of a network of Wordpress multi sites.

work_histories.title: 1 Website  Design,  One (1) Corporate Logo(Usable across all media) and one (1) business card
work_histories.client_feedback: "Xion has excellent customer service and great top graphic and web design skills, he is exceptionally good in his dedication to client satisfaction and top quality work. I would recommend him any day to anybody ...I look forward to working with him over and over again any day"
work_histories.description:
I do NOT plan to pay for more than four (4) hours  on this job, viewing your work profile I believe that you are very skilled and experienced to finish this 3 item work in a jiffy. 

I want you to design four (4) image samples for me to choose, I would show you a sample of such image I saw on a vendor platform, I want a logo of similar elements, theme, and pallets with different element positionings, same theme and character ( humor,  play, cheeky, cunning vibrant, and friendly). 

For the business card and Website is gonna be similar in theme and character. My website is gonna be mostly for blogging now, with offerings tools, I am gonna be blogging and want the blog set up in such a way that monetization tools would be a part of it, to be easily activated when the time comes, without hiring an expert. I have started work on the business card and website for illustration purposes only, so you can get a visual impression of what I need

One (1) business card is what.  I want a design of four (4) cards for sample purposes, I would then choose one from the four (4) . I have already made a sample design for visual impression of what I want. 

Also I want  3 to four (4) samples of draft Corporate logo made for me to choose one (1) for final production

NOTE: 
1. The brand identity must be in alignment across all the three items (Business card, Corporate Logo and Website).

2.  I would need a business email from my web host to be entered on the business card as well
3. The Blog would have a contribution page for visitors with complete FULL blogging tools and features installed. All social medial tools, buttons and links must also be installed
4. At satisfactory  job completion and acceptance by me, Freelancer must TRANSFER and hand over my website credentials (PINS, Password, Key etc.) to me for my personal administration and maintenance

Muktadir I am on a tight budget as I am lunching newly okay

work_histories.title: Wordpress Website UX/UI Redesign
work_histories.description:
These project has 2 sections. If you can do both that's a bonus. 

UX/UI:
Redesign of current Wordpress website (currently has 13 pages)
Redesign brand identity (logo, colors, fonts, etc)
UX/UI: the heart of our website is a form the user fills out. We want to make the form more user friendly, more modern, etc.. 
Speed of website 
Fit to different screen resolutions (mobile, desktop, etc.)

Wordpress Developer: 
Rebuilding form (Gravity Form) 
Addition of payment options 
Addition of user log in/sign up 
Building of an “account” page users can access to see their history 
Add in home page “log in/sign up” option
Panel for us to manage users

work_histories.title: Expert Form Designer for Conversion Rate Optimization Needed
work_histories.description:
We are on the lookout for a form design maestro with a specialty in WSForm for WordPress. Our goal is to elevate our website's conversion rates through meticulously designed forms that not only look great but perform even better. 

The ideal candidate will be a connoisseur in form design, with a proven track record of crafting forms that drive conversions. You should possess a deep understanding of the principles of conversion rate optimization (CRO) as applied to form design, backed by a solid foundation in CSS and design aesthetics.

Responsibilities:
1. Design highly effective WSForm forms for WordPress, focusing on user experience and conversion rate optimization.
2. Implement advanced design techniques to create forms that are both visually appealing and optimized for conversions.
3. Utilize CSS to customize form aesthetics, ensuring that forms are aligned with our site's branding and design guidelines.
4. Collaborate closely with our development team to ensure seamless integration of designed forms into our WordPress site.

Qualifications:
1. Extensive experience in designing high-converting forms for websites, with specific expertise in WSForm for WordPress.
2. Strong background in CSS, with the ability to craft custom form designs that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing.
3. A portfolio showcasing previous form design projects, highlighting successes in improving conversion rates.
4. Knowledge of best practices in form design and conversion rate optimization.
5. Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate design concepts and decisions clearly.

Please include a portfolio or examples of forms you have designed. 

Thanks and looking forward to working with you!

work_histories.title: Designer for Fin-tech Website
work_histories.client_feedback: "Mariia was incredibly responsive, both in communication and to our direction. She was also patient when we had some issues on our end and accommodated all our requests. The top page of our website looks professional now, due to her redesign of our former landing page."
work_histories.description:
Company Overview:
We're a prop trading firm, and our certification program offers traders a chance to prove their skills and trade with our corporate fund. As we revamp our website with a fintech-inspired design, we need a graphic designer to improve the Hero and Sub-Hero section.

Our goal is to encourage as many traders as possible to embark on our certification journey, irrespective of their experience level.

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled graphic designer to create modern, sleek, and detailed design elements for our website. In terms of the style, look, and graphic quality, please refer to the reference images attached. 

2x Deliverables:
- Hero Section 
- Sub-Hero Section

Requirements:
- Current website is designed in Adobe XD, so any file format that's compatible.
- Ability to deliver the first image within 3 days and accommodate up to 2 rounds of revisions (flexible).
- Strong communication skills, with an emphasis on visual references to ensure clarity in design direction.
- A portfolio showcasing previous work, especially in the areas of hero images, illustrations, and background designs.

Budget: 
$300 per section ($600 max for 2 sections total)

Duration: 
1 week (3 days for the initial design, followed by 2 days for revisions). We are somewhat flexible with the schedule.

Preferred Communication:
An initial discussion of design direction, share references, and for us to provide any information to help you. If necessary, we can have a followup call or simply communicate through messages, reference images will be key to ensure both parties have a clear understanding of the expected outcome.

Application Process:
- Share your portfolio.
- Specify your primary area of design expertise (e.g., art direction, illustration).
- Highlight your capabilities and experience, preferably in relation to your past works.

Other Information:
We have attached reference images as a starting point to provide the style and general look&feel of what we were thinking, but we are also open to hearing your creative ideas and suggestions. We value attention to detail and are looking for designs that are modern, welcoming, yet artistic.

We also encourage the use of generative A.I and any other tools to make the final product as great as it can be.

We look forward to seeing your designs and understanding how you can elevate our brand's online presence.

work_histories.client_feedback: "Good designer team, helped us to see some additional angles in our work on the web-site. Our timeline required more capacity from the agency at shorter notice."
work_histories.description:
We are looking for help with designing a web-site which initially will consist of 3 pages (home page, services,about us). Later the web-site will be expanded to more pages. At the moment we had already several iterations and some initial prototypes which did not work for us. 

Design should be clean, minimalist, with focus on clear short communication messages:
 
Home page (focus on brand) examples: 

https://dx.mcdermottplus.com/
https://www.zebiai.com/
https://www.apollo.vc/

Service page - need to show a complex, technological service. Example:

https://rozum.com/robotic-arm/#modifications

We are looking for an individual with substantial experience in web-site design, with proven track record of designing minimalist / clean web-sites. Please include the link to the portfolio or examples.

work_histories.title: Extension of data driven website (Design Art Review)
UX/UI Design for Digital Signage Software CMS
work_histories.client_feedback: "great to work with Mariia. Quick turn around. Great design skills. highly recommend."
work_histories.description:
I am looking for a UI Designer who has experience in creating stunning and intuitive interfaces for a web application which is a Saas platform. Have you ever built complex web applications or SaaS products? 

Current digital signage software CMS UI has following modules and workflow:

1.	Dashboard (Home) - Shows how many player devices online/offline. List of Players and licensing information
2.	Assets - Module to create folder structure and upload images or videos. We want to remove folder creation function and instead upload the file and be able to assign custom tags to filter/search the files. Also needs lazy loading option.
3.	Presentation - Once files are uploaded, next step is to create Presentation slide where you can specify presentation size in pixel, drag and drop one or more widgets and schedule content;
	-	Existing Widgets- Multimedia Widget, Text Widget, Clock Widget, Ticker Widget, HTML5 Embedded code widget. Each widget has properties like size, position, rotation as well as custom formatting properties for text
	-	Each presentation can be tied to a custom tag for search/filter
4.	Playlist - Playlist module is where you can schedule one or more presentation with specific duration
5.	Players - Player module shows all the players connected with CMS system. Each player gets one playlist to play on the connected screen. It also allows to configure player properties remotely i.e. change player name/location, player start/stop time, update frequency, playlist selection etc.
6.	Reports - Report module can generate proof of play report for each player device. There are other type of reports as well.

I'd love someone who can translate existing digital signage software CMS UI into user-friendly designs with simple workflow. Please share your portfolio of work that showcases these type of projects. Samples of your previous work would really help me understand your style and approach.

Once i look at the portfolio/work, I can share login details to interested participants to check out existing UI for better understanding.

The scope of work is as follows;

1.	Create UX/UI Mockup with clear workflow of all the elements in figma or other platform
2.	Convert the mockup into HTML/CSS assets with responsive design

Thanks

work_histories.title: UI/UX Designer (Graphic) FIGMA/REACT/MUI
work_histories.client_feedback: "Great communication, very responsive, understands the conceptual idea quickly while thinking through the function and quickly turning it around into Figma design for developers to reference."
work_histories.description: Looking for a UI/UX Designer that can complement experienced development resources using the REACT framework with MUI components to create a 'heavy' POC/MVP that will likely be extended to a commercial product. Designer would assist in selecting an existing design template or using their own if they have one and adapt it to the project requirements. The project is primarily a B2B application with a focus on workflow, collaboration, and status. Looking for a more 'professional' vibe in terms of look and feel versus spending time creating rich custom graphics. The deliverable(s) include a 'working' design that a fronted developer can easily begin coding against. The team is international and the Designer needs to be able to deal with ambiguity, be proactive and assertive in their needs from others, wear multiple hats in terms of UI, UX, and soliciting requirements via discussion versus a detailed written description - this will be an agile/RAD/JIT effort. We use MS teams for collaboration (chat/video/voice). Design tool to be used is flexible based on best fit for designer balanced against REACT/MUI components (Figma has been mentioned). As of this posting, we have the backend technology selected and in place to begin development. The frontend is going to start in the next week or two.

work_histories.title: UX/UI designer
work_histories.client_feedback: "I highly recommend Mariia for design projects. She demonstrated great skill, creativity, and a strong commitment to meeting project requirements. Mariia's attention to detail and proactive communication greatly contributed to the success of our collaboration. I would gladly work with her again in the future."
work_histories.description: As a UX/UI designer, your role will involve crafting an intuitive and user-friendly interface for our desktop web application using preferably Material-UI (MUI). We want you to apply the principles of MUI to ensure a seamless interaction experience, promoting easy navigation and efficient task completion. This will involve designing and creating the visual components, layout, and interactions using MUI components, and working closely with our developers to implement these designs. Familiarity with MUI themes and customization is a must. Your role is crucial in turning our proof-of-concept into a polished, user-centric product.

I recommend Maria 100%"

I am looking for a talented and experimented designer to build the UX design for both desktop and mobile. An MVP of the platform is ready. A detailed specification presentation will be communicated.

work_histories.title: Experienced UI/UX Designer for Logo Branding, Webapp UI mockup, and Landing Page Design
work_histories.client_feedback: "The designer is responsive and very fast turnaround on the work. The only improvement I will recommend is to be more creative and originality, the work that the designer present lacks some characters to stands out. But after all this is very subjective and she delivers everything on time that is more important."
work_histories.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a seasoned UI/UX designer with a strong background in the investment and trading industry for our upcoming project. The ideal candidate will have experience in creating visually appealing and user-friendly designs similar to platforms like Robinhood.

Your main responsibilities for this contract role will be to design a logo, webapp UI mockup, and a product landing page with a signup form.

Key Responsibilities:

Logo Design: Conceptualize and design a unique, modern, and eye-catching logo that reflects our brand identity and resonates with our target audience.

Webapp UI Design: Develop a comprehensive UI mockup for our trading web application. The design should enhance user experience, promote easy navigation, and embody our brand’s aesthetic.

Landing Page Design: Create an engaging landing page design with a seamless signup form for our product. The design should capture the attention of visitors, communicate our value proposition effectively, and guide users through the signup process with ease.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in UI/UX design. Please provide a portfolio showcasing your previous work.
- **Previous experience in designing for trading/investment platforms is a must.**
- Proficient in design software like Adobe Suite (Illustrator, Photoshop, XD), Sketch, Figma, or similar tools.
- Strong understanding of the latest trends in web design and UX.
- Ability to understand and implement brand guidelines in the design process.
- Exceptional attention to detail.
- Strong communication skills to articulate design decisions and process.
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines.

Please include the word 'trading design' at the start of your proposal to confirm that you've read and understood the job description.

If you believe you're the right fit for this role, we would love to see your proposal along with examples of your work, particularly those related to trading/investment platform designs. This is a contract position, and we are eager to start as soon as possible.

Thank you for considering this opportunity, and we look forward to reviewing your application!

Important Note: If your work during this contract is exceptional, there is potential for this role to transition into a long-term design role with our company. We value our team members and are always on the lookout for outstanding talent to join us on a more permanent basis.

Note: Only applicants who provide relevant portfolio examples as requested will be considered for this role.

Note2: Please only submit a proposal if you agree with the scope and budget. Please do NOT apply if the budget does not match your expectations.

work_histories.title: UX designer for web page improvement
work_histories.client_feedback:
"We were looking for a designer with experience in Figma. We wanted a new look for our award-winning fashion tech product. We did a widget design with Mentalstack.
 I am an Architect and interior designer, so my design standards are HIGH. I have done 2 previous updates to our site with other freelancers outside of upwork and this one was by far the best!. The designs were beautiful and highly professional since it was so powerful, it helped us to define our aesthetics in other spaces like social media and communications.
 It was difficult to get the sense of what we wanted at first but once Elise took our job it was easy and amazing. We would definitely work with Mentalstack in the future."
work_histories.description:
We are BESTLOOK, a fashion guidance system based on fashion consulting principles, we suggest your best-fitting items. We have just been selected as one of the top 10 fashion-tech startups in 2021 ( By Startupbootcamp in MILAN)

This is our B2C site: bestlook.co (There are many improvement opportunities in here still).

But our core product is B2B2C.
We are selling a widget integration in  the brand's website so, we need to:

1.  Create a customizable widget experience within the brand's site
2. Create templates for  re-engagement emails
3. Create sharing cards ( where users can share the results) from personal color palette/ personal style/ likes/ editorial picks etc… so they can see the shared content and re-engage their social media/ mail friends with our brand.
4. Develop an insights dashboard with the information we capture from anonymized data. 
All of the above is UX design ONLY. we have the back end to implement.
Delivery on time a huge plus.

Let me know if this project might be of interest and how is your cost/ time structure.

Hope to hear from you soon.
Best regards,
Adriana
CO-Founder & CEO

work_histories.title: Designing prototype for data driven health-website in German language
work_histories.description:
We are just setting up a new health-portal in German language where constantly news (text, graphs and tables) for all 103 regions in Austria are published. The news are a combination of text, data and graphs that are produced every time there is a new data set available. 

Project details and timeline:

We have a first design draft of one typical page and and want to develop a complete prototype for the whole new portal. This includes design/usability for the mobile portal, newsletter, website and logo-design, but also a detailed specification so that afterwards we can quickly get an offer and start implementation, preferably with the same agency doing the prototype now, with the first part online by the end of November 2020. 

On every page of the 103 regions, there shall be defined automated content, added manual posts, and the possibility to register for a regional newsletter, Google AdSense, own advertisements , Amazon Affiliate Marketing. Based on a rule, selected content shall be automatic published on Social Media (Twitter/LinkedIn/Facebook). 

We want to ideally finish the prototyp until latest beginning of November und ideally contract implementation immediately so that the first part is online still in November 2020. 

Technological Requirements:

The health portal involves constantly downloading data files (mainly csv and json), transforming the data (e. g., correcting data, data mapping, calculating figures which are used then) and setting up a MySQL database to store and share processed data. Data shall also be easy manipulated (accessing data, but also changing data in the database) via Microsoft Excel. Processing the data will involve using Python. 

The implementation after the prototype shall use WordPress and standard PlugIns as much as possible. A proposal for a good WordPress/database hoster in the European Union is welcome.  

Key challenges we recognize:

It is key to (1) create an engaging mobile website with outstanding usability fort he target group (2) make the process of publishing and managing content on up to 103 different regional pages very easy (3) find a good but simple solution to implement the text generation for the posts and (4) employs as much automation as possible

Whome are we looking for:

We look for an experienced designer/developer also considering front and back end implementation byeond pure design issues. An agency with a team of experts supporting him/her is preferred.

We have a clear ideas how the website should look like, but need someone to bring in his/her own ideas for ultimately having a new convincing health portal to make people return and engage. Very good English is needed, German language basic knowledge or experience with implementing software projects in German language is a plus. 

The mentioned project budget is the overall budget including design, implementation, licence cost and overall maintenance for the next 6 months. The current offer shall only involve developing the prototype and working out the relevant specification und is obviously just a part of this budget.

work_histories.title: Build a website for a charcuterie board company
work_histories.client_feedback: "He was great!! Definitely would use again"
work_histories.description:
1. **Landing Page**: A visually appealing landing page that highlights our products and services, showcasing the artistry and variety of our charcuterie offerings. (Charcuterie Boards, Boxes, Catering, Private events)

2. **E-commerce Functionality**: Integration of e-commerce capabilities, allowing customers to browse our products, make purchases, and securely complete transactions online.

3. **Product Pages**: Individual pages for each of our offerings, including charcuterie boards, boxes, catering packages, and private event options. These pages should provide detailed descriptions, high-quality images, and pricing information.

4. **Customization Options**: The ability for customers to customize their orders, selecting specific meats, cheeses, fruits, nuts, and accompaniments according to their preferences.

5. **Booking and Inquiry Forms**: Seamless integration of booking forms for catering services and private events, allowing customers to submit inquiries and requests directly through the website.

6. **Responsive Design**: A mobile-friendly design that ensures optimal viewing and functionality across all devices, including smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers.

7. **Social Media Integration**: Links to our social media profiles and sharing options to encourage engagement and interaction with our brand across various platforms.

8. **Customer Reviews and Testimonials**: A section dedicated to showcasing customer reviews and testimonials, providing social proof and building trust with potential customers.

9. **Contact Information**: Clear and accessible contact information, including our phone number, email address, and physical location (if applicable), to facilitate communication with customers.

10. **FAQ Section**: A frequently asked questions (FAQ) section addressing common inquiries about our products, services, ordering process, and policies.

Hi! I am planning on moving overseas and becoming a freelancer. I want to set up a nice website for my personal brand. I won't blog much but I would like to blog a little. I would like to sell website creation for people to do the same thing as me.

Basically I want to be able to show people how it is possible to build a website and become a freelancer. The client would come to me and I would build a relatively simple website for them.

However, I am still in the learning phase and can't really build my own website yet. (I will much it up big time!)
My business will be selling websites, I know it seems ironic that I am asking for my own website to be built but I hope you can help me out.

Please feel free to get in touch!

work_histories.title: Highly Experienced Web Designers/Developers Required for building a cutting-edge WordPress Site.
work_histories.description:
We have just onboarded a new client web project for an Urban Design/Architecture Company.

We need a new, full website developed in WordPress and it must be visually spectacular, with lot's of beautiful, responsive animation, and a focus on a clear, intutive user journey. There will only be around 5x core pages, and a portfolio. The majority of work for this project will be in design/animation/responsive elements. It must look & function incredibly on both desktop & mobile.

The site will include a portfolio of work, which must be designed in a way that the client can easily add new case studies to the website. We would also like the site to be built in a way where the client can easily update/replace images, text, etc.

We are looking for someone/a team of highly experienced web designers/developers, who are creatively adept, and can create a visually stunning web experience that keeps up with 2023 standards.

We are looking for a person/team that is highly proficient in ENGLISH, and can have weekly video meetings/calls, and can thoughtfully communicate and understand creative ideas.

Initial design/wireframes would be also appreciated.

Some design examples/inspiration of the level of work required are:

- https://www.milkman.com.au/
- https://www.unstudio.com/
- https://www.ablesense.com/
- https://www.nomura-interior.jp/

*IMPORTANT* - Please only apply for this job if you are confident you can produce this high level of work. Depending on the success of this project, we will be offering the selected designer lots of consistant, high paying web projects throughout 2023/2024.

If this is you, this is a fantastic opportunity to secure ongoing, high-paying work from an established Agency.

The attached brochure is for the company we are building this website for, and gives a good understanding of the brand identity and how they present.

We look forward to hearing from you!

work_histories.description:
An audio-visual application for natural language voice ordering of food and 
other services from various menus. Menus may relate to restaurants, health 
spas, pool deck, valet, and other concierge related services. Powered by 
ChatGPT Turbo. 
The application involves:
1) Interaction with a cloud-based server via Socket protocol.
2) 7 different Screens as functionally illustrated.
1) 6 of these screens are fully functional.
2) Specs for the video demo (screen 3 ) to be provided after discussion
3) Voice recording in .wav format.
4) Playback of .mp3 files delivered by the server in real time.
5) Display of text, images and video delivered by server in real time.
6) Transmitting GPS location of phone to server upon activation of app
7) Multi-threading in the Conversation Screen, which plays music from mp3 
files while waiting for server response.
8) Compatibility with IOS and Android operating systems

work_histories.title: E-Commerce Website Redesign
work_histories.description:
We're looking to redesign our e-commerce website www.countertopsmart.com for both the desktop and mobile web experiences. CountertopSmart.com is on a mission to become the go-to marketplace for purchasing countertops entirely online. It's a mission filled with challenges, and therefore great opportunities. 

Purchasing anything from a construction vertical involves collecting a decent amount of necessary user inputs before we can deliver meaningfully accurate estimate information. Our platform is doing what Progressive did for the insurance industry for Countertops: users come to the site, select the material they want to work with, provide their project details through our 'instant estimates' flow, and then compare quotes from providers in their area. 

We need to redesign about 15 pages for both desktop and mobile, and to aid in this project, we have brand/demographic information aggregated into the following documents:

Brand & Audience Onboard: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1s3ZmTm3BUDwPpxtm_qgRX3kuPAiUfraJG-xCCW4e2Vw/edit?usp=sharing 

Pages to Redesign: https://docs.google.com/document/d/126wd3Y5Pq6TyfzPjIEZf5VGWH2TnvB9te-_hF_hlVmU/edit

Our ideal partner is someone with healthy previous ecommerce experience. We need a tried and true professional to help us apply the information we have of our target demographic to our site and create a killer, unforgettable brand and user experience. We need someone who can help us make CountertopSmart the brand name for countertops across the nation. 

To bid on this project, start by going through our site and applying your critical design eye to our current user experience. When sending your proposal, suggest one thing that you would immediately change on the site to make it better. This is our way of gauging how interested you are in taking this project (and to see if you read this far). We look forward to your proposals!

Bonus: Although this task is largely design oriented, if you have experience with front-end engineering and design implementation, that earns massive brownie points in our eyes! We're open to discussing the various price points associated with design only vs. design + implementation with this project.

work_histories.title: Website Refresh
work_histories.description:
Overview:
We are seeking a talented Website Developer with expertise in WordPress to assist in the redesign of our company website. As an Executive Search firm specializing in high-level roles and fractional executive placements, we aim to elevate our online presence with a modern, luxurious appearance that appeals to our discerning audience of high-level professionals. The successful candidate will collaborate closely with our team to refresh our website, ensuring it not only looks impressive but also effectively represents our brand and services.

Responsibilities:

Collaborate with our team to understand the vision and objectives for the website redesign project.
Conduct a comprehensive assessment of our current WordPress website to identify areas for improvement and modernization.
Develop a detailed project plan outlining key milestones, timelines, and deliverables for the website redesign.
Implement modern design elements and UX/UI enhancements to create a visually stunning and user-friendly website.
Customize and optimize WordPress themes, plugins, and functionalities to meet the specific needs of our Executive Search business.
Ensure the website is responsive across all devices and browsers, providing a seamless experience for users.
Integrate high-quality imagery, graphics, and multimedia content to enhance the visual appeal and engagement of the website.
Implement SEO best practices to improve search engine visibility and drive organic traffic to the website.
Conduct thorough testing and troubleshooting to identify and resolve any issues or bugs.
Provide documentation and training to our team members on how to manage and update the website content independently.

Requirements:

Proven experience as a Website Developer with expertise in WordPress.
Strong portfolio showcasing previous WordPress website redesign projects, preferably for clients in the professional services or corporate sector.
Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and other relevant web development languages and frameworks.
Excellent understanding of UX/UI principles and best practices, with the ability to create visually appealing and intuitive website designs.
Experience customizing and optimizing WordPress themes, plugins, and functionalities to meet specific project requirements.
Familiarity with SEO principles and techniques to enhance website visibility and performance.
Strong communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively liaise with internal stakeholders and team members.
Detail-oriented mindset with a focus on delivering high-quality work within tight deadlines.
Self-motivated and proactive approach to problem-solving, with the ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Availability to start immediately and commit to the project timeline.

work_histories.title: HubSpot Developer to Build Website on Hubspot
work_histories.description:
Experienced HubSpot Developer Needed for Website Development from Figma Design

Job Description:

We are looking for a skilled HubSpot developer to transform our Figma-designed website into a fully functional and responsive HubSpot site for our client. 

Our agency is dedicated to delivering top-tier digital experiences, and we require a developer who shares our passion for quality and innovation.

Responsibilities:

- Translate our Figma design into a live, fully functional HubSpot website, ensuring pixel-perfect execution.
- Implement responsive design to ensure the website performs seamlessly across various devices and browsers.
- Work closely with our design team to understand the project's vision and requirements, providing technical insights to enhance the outcome.
- Integrate HubSpot CRM features and functionalities to improve user experience and lead management capabilities.
- Optimize website performance for speed and efficiency.
- Ensure the final product is SEO-friendly and complies with web standards.
- Conduct thorough testing and debugging to guarantee a smooth launch.
- Provide documentation and support for future updates and maintenance.

Requirements:

- Proven experience in HubSpot website development with a portfolio to showcase previous projects.
- Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and HubL's HubSpot's markup language.
- Deep understanding of Figma and the ability to translate designs into functional web pages.
- Familiarity with HubSpot CRM and integration of marketing tools.
- Knowledge of SEO best practices and web standards.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
- Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively with a remote team.

work_histories.title: Build Shopify Website
work_histories.description:
About Us:

We are an Amazon Brand that sells Planners in the Office Supply category. 

Job Description:

We are seeking a talented and experienced Shopify Website Developer to help us create an engaging and user-friendly e-commerce website for our Amazon brand. As a Shopify Website Developer, you will play a crucial role in establishing our online presence, enhancing user experience, and driving online sales.

Key Responsibilities:

- Collaborate with our team to understand business goals and website requirements.
- Design and develop a responsive and visually appealing Shopify website that aligns with our brand identity.
- Customize and optimize the Shopify theme to meet our specific needs.
Integrate Shopify with Amazon Marketplace for seamless order and inventory management.
- Implement SEO best practices to improve website visibility and search engine ranking.
- Ensure website security and optimize page loading speed for an excellent user experience.
- Configure and manage payment gateways, shipping options, and tax settings.
- Create and maintain product listings, categories, and collections on Shopify.
- Troubleshoot and resolve any technical issues, bugs, or errors on the website.

Qualifications:
- Proven experience in Shopify website development and customization.
- Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
- Strong knowledge of Shopify themes, Liquid programming, and app integration.
- Experience with Amazon Marketplace integration is a plus.
- Understanding of SEO best practices.
- Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

Prior experience with e-commerce websites is preferred.

work_histories.title: Wordpress Site for Fundraising
work_histories.description:
We want to develop and host a high performance WordPress site for Charity donations with features similar to Kickstarter, GoFundMe, or Indiegogo, along with the related plugins. It should also support Events. 

We are looking for skilled Wordpress experts who have worked in specific on projects similar to the requirement below. We expect to be shown live sites and portfolio of similar work. WE prefer use of plugins to complete this work quickly and will prefer experts who have a plan to do this with very little customisation. Where customisation is done, we expect the experts to use plugins and Wordpress framework to ensure maintainability. Changes should NOT affect future updates. 

The site will implement additional feature for users to register their organizations and on approval post campaigns. A moderation and permissions system will ensure a Site Admin can approve Organizations to post campaigns and for certain organziations, also moderate the campaigns that are posted. The sytem also needs to support "badges" for organizations and campaigns assigned by the Site Admin. Attached below is an overview of the features and the plugins to illustrate the features we are looking to implement. 

1. User Registration and Management:
    - Allow users to sign up, log in, and manage their profiles.
    - Also attach Organization info so that both User and Organization approvals can run concurrently 
    - Example Plugins:
        - [Ultimate Member](https://wordpress.org/plugins/ultimate-member/)
        - [Profile Builder](https://wordpress.org/plugins/profile-builder/)

2. Campaign Creation and Management:
    - Users should be able to create, manage, and customize their campaigns.
    - Set funding goals, deadlines, and track progress.
    - Display media, description, updates, and comments for campaigns.
    - Example Plugins:
        - [WP Crowdfunding](https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-crowdfunding/)
        - [Charitable – Donation Plugin](https://wordpress.org/plugins/charitable/)

3. Listing of Organizations:
    - Create organization profiles with related campaigns.
    - Approve Organizations by Site Admin for publishing. Selected fields are shown in an "About $Organization" page to public. 
    - Allow users to search and filter organizations and their campaigns.
    - Example Plugins:
        - Custom Post Type UI (for creating 'Organization' custom post type)
        - Advanced Custom Fields (for adding custom fields to organizations)

4. Donation Processing:
    - Securely handle transactions.
    - Support multiple payment gateways.
    - Allow for one-time and recurring donations.
    - Example Plugins:
        - [GiveWP – Donation Plugin and Fundraising Platform](https://wordpress.org/plugins/give/)
        - [WooCommerce](https://wordpress.org/plugins/woocommerce/) with donation extensions if needed.

5. Moderation System:
    - Approve or disapprove organizations and campaigns before they are publicly listed.
    - Allow moderators/admins to edit or request changes.
    - Example Plugins:
        - [PublishPress Capabilities: Manage WordPress Permissions, Edit Roles](https://wordpress.org/plugins/capability-manager-enhanced/)
        - [WP Approve User](https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-approve-user/)

6. Communication System:
    - Allow communication between backers and campaign organizers.
    - Send automated emails for campaign updates, donation receipts, etc.
    - Example Plugins:
        - [BuddyPress](https://wordpress.org/plugins/buddypress/)
        - [WP Mail SMTP by WPForms](https://wordpress.org/plugins/wp-mail-smtp/)

7. Reporting and Analytics:
    - View donation statistics and trends.
    - Track successful vs. unsuccessful campaigns.
    - Example Plugins:
        - [GiveWP Reports](https://givewp.com/addons/reports/) (addon for GiveWP)
        - [MonsterInsights – Google Analytics Dashboard for WordPress](https://wordpress.org/plugins/google-analytics-for-wordpress/)

8. Social Sharing and Promotion:
    - Share campaigns on social media platforms.
    - Embed campaigns on other websites.
    - Example Plugins:
        - [Easy Social Share Buttons for WordPress](https://codecanyon.net/item/easy-social-share-buttons-for-wordpress/6394476)
        - [MashShare – Social Media Share Buttons](https://wordpress.org/plugins/mashsharer/)

9. Responsive Design and Mobile Optimization:
    - Ensure site is functional and looks great on all devices.
    - Example Plugins:
        - Most modern WordPress themes are responsive by design. We are looking for recommendations here 

10. Security:
    - Protect against hacks, data breaches, and spam.
    - Example Plugins:
        - [Wordfence Security](https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordfence/)
        - [iThemes Security](https://wordpress.org/plugins/better-wp-security/)
        - [Akismet Anti-Spam](https://wordpress.org/plugins/akismet/)

work_histories.title: Experienced Web Developer Needed for Custom Squarespace Design
work_histories.description:
I am seeking a skilled web developer with a strong background in customizing Squarespace websites. My project involves translating detailed Figma designs into a fully functional and aesthetically pleasing Squarespace website. While Squarespace's "fluid engine" offers flexibility, my goal is to extend beyond its standard capabilities to create a unique and engaging user experience.

Key Responsibilities:
* Convert detailed FIGMA designs into pixel-perfect implementations on Squarespace.
* Ensure the design is fully responsive and optimized for tablets and mobile devices.
* Incorporate sophisticated animations and transitions to enhance the website's interactivity and visual appeal.
* Work efficiently to meet project deadlines, ensuring a quick turnaround time.
* Maintain clear and effective communication in English throughout the project.
* Be open to and incorporate feedback, making necessary revisions to align with the project's vision.
Qualifications:
* Proven experience in customizing Squarespace websites, with a portfolio showcasing previous work.
* Strong proficiency in translating designs from FIGMA to Squarespace.
* Exceptional skills in creating responsive web designs.
* Proficiency in coding animations and transitions specifically for Squarespace platforms.
* Excellent communication skills and ability to work collaboratively.
* Commitment to delivering high-quality work and adhering to timelines.

Additional Information:
I am looking for a candidate who is not only capable of bringing this vision to life but also interested in forming a long-term partnership. Successful collaboration on this project may lead to more opportunities in the future.
I look forward to seeing examples of your previous custom-built Squarespace sites, as this will be a key factor in my selection process.

work_histories.title: UX/UI Designer for E-Learning Startup
work_histories.description:
We’re looking for a part-time UX/UI designer to help with the design and user experience of our e-learning, mentorship & graduate recruitment platform. Working closely with our Head of Product and engineering team, you will respond to design needs and combine interfaces and workflows to enhance user experience.

In this role, you should be an analytical and creative designer who is able to grasp user needs and solve problems. A strong portfolio of successful UX and other technical projects is essential.

Experience in both web and mobile app design is a must, as well as a strong understanding of core UX principles to create a feedback loop with our three main user groups – students and grads, mentors, and company partners.

Responsibilities

- Understand product specifications and user psychology
- Develop wireframes and prototypes around customer needs
- Define the right interaction model and evaluate its success
- Find creative ways to solve UX problems (e.g. usability, findability)
- Work with UI designers to implement attractive designs
- Communicate design ideas and prototypes to developers
- Conduct concept and usability testing and gather feedback
- Create personas through user research and data

Requirements

- Proven experience as a UX Designer, UI Designer or similar role
- Strong portfolio of design projects
- Familiarity with interaction design and information architecture
- Proficient in design software (e.g. Figma, Balsamiq)
- Knowledge of HTML/CSS; JavaScript is a plus
- Problem-solving aptitude
- Excellent communication skills

work_histories.client_feedback: "Ayan crushed it!  We asked him for a website overhaul and he delivered.  Very quick to communicate and also make requested changes!  Highly recommend."
work_histories.description:
Job Description:
We are a dynamic agency in need of a skilled WordPress developer with a strong background in Elementor, SEO optimization, and mobile-responsive design. Our goal is to transform our existing website into a user-friendly, SEO-optimized platform, drawing inspiration from a few other sites. We aim to enhance our site's ability to generate at least 5+ sales appointments monthly through effective web traffic strategies and seamless Calendly integration.

Responsibilities:
Website Overhaul: Redesign our current WordPress site to improve user experience, ensuring mobile responsiveness and ease of navigation, with a professional aesthetic mirroring the essence of the provided example sites.
Calendly Integration: Implement a visible Calendly link on the homepage, with multiple strategically placed CTAs throughout the site, encouraging visitors to schedule sales appointments.
SEO Optimization: Apply advanced SEO strategies to rank for key terms such as "retail media agency" and "full-service Amazon agency," with the aim of outperforming competitors in search results. Provide guidance on creating SEO-friendly content post-optimization.
Plugin Utilization: Assess and recommend WordPress plugins that align with our objectives of enhancing SEO and appointment generation capabilities.

Requirements:
Proficient in WordPress and Elementor, with a portfolio showcasing previous work on similar projects.
Strong understanding of SEO best practices and experience in optimizing WordPress sites for search engines and user engagement.
Experience with mobile-responsive design and the ability to create visually appealing sites that match the look and feel of the provided examples.
Ability to integrate scheduling tools like Calendly into WordPress sites in a user-friendly manner.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to provide clear instructions for maintaining and updating SEO-friendly content.

Project Details:
Timeline: Would love to get this done in the next few weeks!

work_histories.description:
Project Overview:
We are seeking a skilled WordPress developer with expertise in Elementor to transform our existing Figma design into a fully functional website. The project involves building a website for a charitable organization focused on crime prevention and community support, using the detailed designs provided to ensure the new site is visually compelling, user-friendly, and effective in engaging different user personas.
Scope of Work:
Task 1: Elementor Development
Convert Figma designs into a WordPress website using Elementor, adhering closely to the design specifications.
Ensure the website is fully responsive, functioning optimally on all devices and browsers.
Task 2: Functionality Implementation
Integrate necessary functionalities such as contact forms, donation processing, and program referrals, as specified in the Figma designs.
Implement any custom Elementor widgets or code snippets needed to fulfill design requirements.
Task 3: Content Integration and Management
Populate the website with provided content, ensuring all text, images, and videos are correctly formatted and displayed according to the Figma layout.
Set up an easy-to-manage backend that allows the client to update content as needed without developer assistance.
Task 4: Testing and Optimization
Perform thorough testing to ensure the site is bug-free and fully operational.
Optimize the website for speed and search engines to ensure quick loading times and visibility.
Assets Provided:
Access to the current website and hosting details.
Complete Figma designs and all associated assets (images, fonts, icons).
Brand guidelines and any specific design or functionality documentation.
Requirements:
Proven experience in building websites with WordPress and Elementor based on Figma designs.
Ability to interpret design files accurately and implement them into functional web elements.
Strong understanding of responsive design principles and SEO best practices.
Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently.
Final Steps:
Provide a training session for the client on managing and updating the website.
Hand over all source files and documentation related to the website's development.
Deliverables:
A fully functional website built on WordPress using Elementor.
Source files and access credentials.
A brief operational manual for site maintenance and updates.
How to Apply:
Include evidence of previous projects where you have converted Figma designs to Elementor-based websites.
Outline your approach to this project, including any tools or plugins you anticipate using.
Show us your best example sites you have built yourself exemplifying beautiful animations and graphic features with great UX/UI.
Skills Required:
Expertise in WordPress and Elementor
Familiarity with Figma and design implementation
Responsive and accessible design
SEO Optimization
Custom Widget Development
Content Management Systems
User Interface Coding
Performance Tuning
Debugging and Testing
Training and Documentation
Bonus:
Proposals that include a detailed implementation plan and timeline, as well as proactive suggestions for enhancing site functionality or performance, will be highly regarded.
This ERFP calls for a developer who can efficiently and accurately bring a design vision to life, ensuring the final website not only meets but exceeds the needs of the organization and its community.

work_histories.title: Website Refresh for Personal and Professional Site
work_histories.client_feedback: "Project completed to satisfaction. All feedback was responded to quickly and professionally."
work_histories.description:
Objective: Refresh and enhance the visual appeal, user experience, and SEO performance of a WordPress-based personal and professional website, without a complete redesign. The site hosts a collection of blog posts, professional information, and resources related to business management, startups, and a list and map of casinos in the USA.

Current Platform: WordPress with Virtue theme by Kadance. The site has evolved over several years and lacks cohesive design elements.

Key Issues:
Lack of visual appeal and inconsistent design elements.
User feedback indicates difficulty viewing and reading content, especially blog posts.
Interest in improving SEO aspects as a secondary priority.

WORK:
- Assess and propose improvements to color palettes and font styles to enhance readability and visual appeal.
- Review and recommend changes to the layout, menus, and overall structure to improve user navigation and content discoverability.
- Enhance the presentation of high-traffic pages, particularly those related to casino information and the map feature.
- Explore alternatives to the current Google map implementation for displaying casino information, focusing on user engagement and ease of use.

Looking for a consultant with:
- Proven experience in WordPress site development and design, with a portfolio of previous projects.
- Expertise in UI/UX design principles.
- Ability to provide and implement creative solutions for content presentation, particularly for Blogs and complex information like maps.
- Ability to work with Google Analytics and 3rd party products for tracking user engagement
- Future: Ability to implement advertisements or other monetizing elements

Selection will be made quickly based on talent profile and previous work portfolio samples. There is a limited not to exceed budget and the rate with estimated hours will be a consideration. There is a possibility for additional work later this year as the casino data expands and may become its own project. If seeing the current site would help with the proposal, message me and I will provide the URL.

work_histories.title: Design & Develop Responsive Wordpress Theme for Telehealth Company
work_histories.description:
Hey Upwork,

We're looking for an experienced developer(s) to design and develop custom Wordpress theme for Telehealth company. The developer will be expected to work closely with our team and provide daily summaries. Please note we want the theme to be created in Elementor to allow for easy editing and custom templates that can be used as landing pages for new offerings/products in the future. You will be responsible for designing and developing the front-end of the website only. 

We would like to have an MVP completed within a month, with a final completed version ready in 4-6 weeks. We are flexible with the budget. Please provide estimated cost and timeline to complete this project.

---- PLUGINS ----
• Gravity Forms ~ Create custom classes for field types that can be manually added to GF custom class input. 

• Elementor ~ Create page templates for different layouts and page types (see examples below) 

---- PAGE TEMPLATES ----
Below is a brief example of the different page templates. You will be provided with a detailed breakdown of each page type and the page's components. 

Care type (service) ➝ Treatments (product categories) ➝ Conditions (product groups) ➝ Medication (product)


• Care type ~ 1-3 pages
Provide description of the type of care and the treatments that fall within. The goal is to inform customers on the services offered within this type of care and set expectations. *TBD* We could do 1 page with sections for each type of care, or dedicated pages for each.

(single page example) 
https://plushcare.com/what-we-treat/

(separate page examples) 
https://doctorondemand.com/what-we-treat/chronic-care/
https://www.forhims.com/primary-care

• Treatments (product categories)
List of all products and services organized by category. 

https://www.goodrx.com/care/services
https://www.lemonaidhealth.com/

• Conditions (product groups) 
Provide description and list of treatment options offered to treat condition. 

https://www.getroman.com/ed/
https://www.nurx.com/acne-treatment/
https://www.forhims.com/hair-loss

• Medication (Product details page)
Page template for specific/single medication (or) product

https://picnicallergy.com/products/loratadine
https://www.ziphealth.co/clinics/erectile-dysfunction/generic-tadalafil

---- MISC PAGES ----
In addition to the page templates above, we also would like to have the following miscellaneous pages developed:
- Home page
- About 
- How it works
- Pricing
- FAQ

The screens will be shown to potential customers and investors in order to help them visualize the product and "sell" them on it. 

The product is a CRM platform with data analytics and reporting functionalities. The key pages, which we have visual mock ups for, include: (1) dashboard reporting page with pie charts and other data analytics; (2) CRM-style data logging entry page; (3) calendar page with key to-dos and dates to track; (4) standard web page with institution and employee information; (5) home landing page

work_histories.title: UX design for simple fitness related mobile app
work_histories.client_feedback: "Thank you very much for your work, was a pleasure working with you"
work_histories.description:
We are doing some experimentation about a workout app.

Personal or professional experience in working out / sports  or fitness industry will be greatly appreciated

We are looking for a UX designer to create the most simple and efficient / fast user experience to create a workout.

This job is an opportunity to showcase your skill, creativity and efficiency and could lead to a bigger project.

1. Entry Point is a blank page with a button "create workout"

We want you to create the user experience when user click this button.

A few thing about the user:

User knows working out (exercises, science etc) very well
User has access to his past and max performances if needed

A few things about workout:

Workout can (but not mandatory) be structured as warm up, exercise(s), cool down, stretch

Workout can be categorized (aeorobic, strenght, power etc)

Workout exercises can (but not mandatory) be structured as blocks (group of exercises)

Workout exercises can be structured as sets, reps, distance, time etc. depending on the nature of exercise

Recovery time can be specified whenever necessary

Load can be specified either absolutely or relatively (e.g 100kg , or 80% max lift for example, same for time or distance based exercise)

What is expected of you: 

Main deliverable is a wireframe (Figma, Adobe Xd, Sketch)

Please reach us with the following

- 3 sentences max why you are the right person for the job
- relevant project you have done
- estimated timeframe and costs to complete the task

If you need further clarifications don't hesitate to contact us.
Best

work_histories.title: UI Designer for Web Applications
work_histories.client_feedback: "Great to work with and I would work with him again!"
work_histories.description:
**Job Description:**

Greetings Designers,

I'm Jordan, a web app developer who specializes in building MVPs and internal business applications. My strength lies in development, but I need your creative expertise and eye for design. I'm seeking a skilled web app designer for a long-term partnership, where you'll primarily create the design, and I'll bring it to life.

You will be communicating directly with me, and I will relay any feedback from my clients to you. My primary projects are sophisticated platforms and apps, so this role requires extensive experience in designing more than just landing pages.

**Job Responsibilities:**

1. Creating sleek and user-friendly web app designs based on the provided company color scheme, logo, and user experience guidelines.
2. Working closely with me to create designs that serve as a starting point for development. Details are essential but not as much as giving a clear direction to start the development process.
3. Participating in regular meetings to discuss design options and client feedback.

**Required Skills:**

1. Proficiency in popular design tools (Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD, or similar).
2. Excellent communication and collaborative skills.
3. Ability to work independently and prioritize tasks.
4. Extensive experience in designing complex platforms and applications, not just landing pages.
5. A strong understanding of the best UX/UI practices.

This role offers the opportunity to work on diverse projects and collaborate closely with a developer (myself). If you're passionate about web app design and keen to work in a long-term partnership, this could be the perfect role for you.

Please check out my profile at nocodebyjordan.com to see the kind of applications I typically build. It will give you a clearer idea of the style and complexity of the projects we'll be working on.

If you think you're a good fit, please apply with your portfolio showing your past web app design work.

Looking forward to building incredible web applications together!

Best,
Jordan

Experience with responsive design and mobile-first approach.
Familiarity with content management systems (CMS) such as WordPress.

Opportunity for Permanent Role:
If the work is completed to a high standard and demonstrates excellent design skills, there is a potential opportunity for a permanent role within our organization. This would involve further web design responsibilities, including the creation of functional websites and ongoing maintenance.

To Apply:
Please submit your portfolio showcasing your previous web design work along with your resume and a brief introduction outlining your relevant experience. Additionally, include your expected hourly rate or project-based fee. We will review the applications and contact the selected candidates for further discussion.

Note: This is a remote freelance position, and candidates from any location are welcome to apply.

work_histories.title: Responsive UX/UI designer to design kid-friendly web app
work_histories.description:
We are working on building a bedtime story website for kids.  The big idea is parents fill in some details about the story then the website will generate a story that the parents read to their kids before bedtime.

I have attached the current UI screenshots just to give you an idea of the functionality the site has.  We do not like the current UI, it is boring and not kid-friendly.

We want the overall design to be fun and kid-friendly (see https://sagomini.com as an example of a fun kid's site).

We need 4 screens designed:

- The landing page with a call-to-action button to go to the story-builder page
- The story-builder page - this is where the user will input the various character names, themes, and tone of the story
- The story-loading page - it takes about 20-30 seconds to generate the story so we need something fun to show while that happens
- The story-reading page - this page shows the story that was generated.

I don't have website copy yet, so feel free to put in some placeholder copy.  If you have experience/skills in website copy then that would be great.

work_histories.title: UI / UX Redesign - Financial Web Application
work_histories.description:
Our company is a financial institution operating in developing countries. We have developed our own Loan Management System (/ Loan Origination) web application. This includes CRM and the full cycle of the client/ loan process. 

We are looking to refresh the design to make the UI more engaging, more intuitive and easier for use by our employees. 
The following principles need to be taken into account: 
1.	We are operating in developing countries, so connectivity is an issue. For this reason we have kept a relatively clean, minimalist design to reduce the page loading time. Any redesign must take into account page speed. 
2.	The site is multilingual
3.	We want to add some instructions / guide on the steps that will be taken by the user to make it easier for them. 

Deliverables:

2.	Once approved, redesign of the pages
3.	Provide design in Figma which will be used by the developer to implement.

work_histories.title: UX/UI Designer for Coming Soon Landing Page on Figma
Custom Website Design Refresh :: Manufacturing Data Management
work_histories.description:
Project Description: User Interface Refresh for Manufacturing Data Website

Introduction:
The User Interface Refresh project aims to enhance the user experience and visual appeal of an existing manufacturing data website. The platform serves as a critical tool for professionals in the manufacturing industry to access and analyze essential data, enabling them to make informed decisions, optimize processes, and improve overall productivity. This project seeks to revitalize the website's design, streamline navigation, and implement modern UI/UX principles to empower users with a seamless and efficient data entry and exploration experience.

The current website is a custom web application using Ruby on Rails and React. We would hope to be able to develop a custom standardized component library along with specific page layouts and views. Experience with analytical views or data visualization is a plus.


Objectives:
The primary objectives of this project are as follows:
a. Enhance Usability: Simplify website navigation, reduce clutter, and optimize workflows to ensure users can effortlessly access and interpret manufacturing data.
b. Modernize Visual Design: Refresh the website's appearance with a contemporary design, appealing color schemes, and visually engaging elements to captivate users and encourage extended engagement.
c. Improve Data Visualization: Implement interactive and dynamic data visualization techniques, such as charts, graphs, and infographics, to facilitate data comprehension and analysis.


Scope:
The scope of the User Interface Refresh project includes, but is not limited to:

a. Information Architecture: Refining the website's structure and content organization to create an intuitive and logical user flow.
b. Wireframing and Prototyping: Developing wireframes and interactive prototypes to visualize the proposed interface changes and gather early feedback from stakeholders.
c. Visual Design: Creating high-fidelity visual designs that align with the brand identity and resonate with the target audience, while maintaining a focus on data clarity.
e. Responsive Development: Implementing the approved designs using responsive web development techniques to ensure compatibility across different devices.
f. Data Visualization: Integrating interactive data visualization libraries to present manufacturing data in a user-friendly and informative manner.
. User Testing: Conducting usability testing with real users to validate the effectiveness of the new interface and making necessary adjustments based on feedback.

Timeline:
 Specific timelines for each phase will be outlined in the project plan, considering factors such as design approvals, development, testing, and implementation.

Deliverables:
a. Information architecture and sitemap.
b. Wireframes and interactive prototypes.
c. High-fidelity visual designs for the new interface.
d. Data visualization suggestions/prototype
e. Develop a custom standardized component library along with specific page layouts and views

work_histories.title: UI / UX designer for Web and Apps
Unleash Creativity & Expertise: Website Design and Webflow Development
work_histories.description:
About SMEVentures:

SMEVentures is a leading platform empowering the growth and sustainability of small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) in Asia Pacific. We bridge the gap between retiring owners and the next generation of entrepreneurial talent through our unique search fund model.

Challenge:

Our current website doesn't fully capture our vision and potential. We're hungry for a website that breaks the mold, sets a new standard for the industry, and seamlessly delivers impactful results. We seek a talented individual or team who can bring our bold vision to life through exceptional design and strategic development in Webflow.

Objective:

Craft a stunning and user-friendly website that embodies our brand identity and future aspirations.
Clearly communicate our value proposition and competitive advantage in a fresh and engaging way, driving conversions.
Showcase success stories and testimonials with impactful visuals and storytelling.
Design a website that is easily adaptable and future-proof, paving the way for further brand iterations.
Develop the website in Webflow, ensuring smooth functionality, responsiveness, and optimal user experience.

Scope of Work:

Website design (UI/UX): Design a website that is modern, intuitive, and visually captivating.
Prototyping: Create high-fidelity prototypes to showcase your design vision.
Information architecture: Strategically map out website content and functionality for optimal user experience and conversion optimization.
Webflow development: Develop the website using Webflow, ensuring clean code, responsiveness across devices, and SEO best practices.
Deliverables: Design mockups, prototypes, style guide, asset files, fully functional Webflow website.
Desired Skills and Experience:

Exceptional design skills and a proven track record of creating innovative and impactful websites for B2B companies.
Strong understanding of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design principles.
Experience with Webflow development and best practices.
Solid understanding of conversion optimization techniques and data-driven design.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

Bonus:

Portfolio showcasing successful website design and development projects for similar B2B businesses.

Additional Notes:

This is a combined design and development project. We expect the chosen individual or team to handle both aspects seamlessly.
Upon successful completion of this project, there are potential follow-up design and development opportunities as we roll out our upgraded branding.
We're a small business with big ambitions, and we're looking for a partner who shares our passion and growth mindset.
