work_histories.title: Seeking a European Web/Mobile Designer (Ukrainian preferred)
Cannabis Company Needs A Figma Designer For Social Media Content
Dashboard UX/UI Redesign for AI platform
work_histories.description:
We're a cannabis company that is launching 3 new media brands on Facebook & Instagram. Each brand is focused on a different demographic (baby boomers, millennials, and gen z) but all share similar content related to cannabis news and culture. 

We need a graphic designer to take our content and visual identity and create social media posts for each brand. 

We're looking for someone that:

1. Has worked full-time in Figma for at least 2 years
2. Has at least 4 hours of overlap with PST timezone
3. Can generate photos as needed using Midjourney or related AI image generators

For us, the most important thing is that you do amazing work, and do it quickly. We want to be impressed right out of the gate. We only work with the best and are happy pay the highest rates for excellent work. 

We're looking for someone that can work on retainer about 10 hours per week. 

However, we're starting with a trial project that includes the following:

3x Instagram story images for brand spotlight concept
3x Instagram story images for 30s dosing guide concept
3x 5 to 7 slide FB carousel images for 5 things to try while high concept

Here's a complete overview of the trial project: (link removed)

Here's a link to the trial project in Figma: (link removed)

We expect this project to take 4 to 8 hours to complete.

work_histories.description:
Job Description:
We are looking for a skilled and creative vector designer to contribute to our enamel jewelry line. As a vector designer, you will have the opportunity to showcase your talent by creating captivating designs for our jewelry pieces. This freelance position allows you to work remotely and collaborate with our team. If you have a passion for vector design and a keen eye for aesthetics, we would love to work with you.

Responsibilities:
- Create original vector designs for enamel jewelry, including pendants, earrings, and rings.
- Develop unique and compelling concepts based on design guidelines.
- Incorporate suitable color schemes and patterns for enamel jewelry manufacturing.
- Ensure that designs meet technical requirements for production.
- Revise and refine designs based on feedback to meet project goals.
- Deliver designs within agreed-upon deadlines while maintaining quality standards.

Required Skills and Qualifications:
- Proven experience as a vector designer or graphic designer.
- Proficiency in vector graphics software such as Adobe Illustrator or CorelDRAW.
- Understanding of design principles and composition.
- Effective communication and collaboration skills in a remote team environment.
- Creative mindset with attention to detail.
- Strong time management and organizational skills.
- Portfolio showcasing your vector design work.

Preferred Skills:
- Familiarity with current trends in enamel jewelry design.
- Experience in the fashion/accessories industry.
- Knowledge of enamel jewelry manufacturing processes.
- Jewelry design experience.


If you are passionate about creating vector designs for enamel jewelry and possess the required skills, we would love to review your portfolio. Please include samples of your work with your application. We look forward to the opportunity to collaborate with you on our exciting jewelry line.

work_histories.title: Enhancing SEO Landing Page
work_histories.description:
Project Brief: Enhancing SEO Landing Page


Project Objective:
The objective of this project is to optimize the SEO landing page at the URL: https://onwise.nl/zoekmachine-optimalisatie/ to improve user engagement, highlight the unique selling points of our SEO services, and encourage visitors to take action.


Current State Analysis:
- The current landing page lacks an attractive header and introduction.
- It is not distinct from competitors' pages.
- It does not effectively invite visitors to explore further.
- There is no clear call-to-action (CTA) on the page.
- Testimonials from satisfied clients are missing.
- Experience and certifications are not prominently displayed.
- It's unclear which tools are utilized.


Desired Outcome:
- Visitors should gain a clear understanding of our expertise as an SEO specialist and the specific services offered.
- They should feel confident that they have found the right solution for their SEO needs.
- The landing page should reflect us as qualified professionals in the field.


Benchmarking:
A good example to follow is the landing page at https://victorious.com/, which demonstrates:

- Intuitive design.
- Attractive header.
- Concise introduction highlighting unique selling points.
- Clear CTA to a low-barrier offer.
- Easy contact options.
- Explanation of SEO methodology and offered services.
- Success stories or testimonials from previous clients.
- Display of experience and certifications.
- Mention of specific tools used.
- Inclusion of a blog section for updates and tips.


Proposed Solutions:
1. Develop a compelling title and introduction emphasizing the unique aspects of our SEO services.
2. Highlight our unique selling points in a USP bar. For now, name them USP 1, 2 and 3. 
3. Strategically place clear CTAs for a free SEO audit.
4. Showcase positive testimonials from satisfied clients.
5. Emphasize our experience and certifications (FD Gazellen, Emerce 100, Google Premier Partner )prominently.
6. Mention the use of specific SEO tools (Screaming Frog, SE Ranking, Ahrefs, SEMrush).
7. Ensure sub-service links remain visible  (SEO Content, Linkbuilding, Zoekwoorden Onderzoek etc.)
8. Add a content block detailing our methodology.
9. Incorporate FAQs smoothly into the page.


Considerations:
- Retain the original photo material.
- Maintain the blog section on the page.
- Keep "meet the team" section accessible.
- Preserve the header and footer.
- Maintain styling consistency with the original design.


Timeline:
The project is expected to be completed within a week, but first concept within a day.

All the best!

work_histories.title: Solar Panels Thank You Page
work_histories.description:
Briefing for Solar Xtra Thank You Page

Objective: The purpose of this project is to create a thank you page for Solar Xtra, which visitors will land on after requesting a quote for solar panel installation services. The page should effectively convey gratitude, confirm the user's action, provide information about next steps, offer optional social sharing, include links to relevant content, maintain a professional layout, and incorporate a clear call-to-action.

Key Points to Include:

1. Clear Thank You Message: Ensure the message of gratitude is clear and sincere. Utilize friendly and polite language to express appreciation.

2. Confirmation of Action: Clearly reference the specific action the user has taken, in this case, requesting a quote.

3. Information about Next Steps: Inform users about the next steps, such as waiting for a callback from Solar Xtra.

4. Optional Social Shareability: Provide the option to share the thank you page on social media platforms to encourage users to share their experience and motivate others to take similar actions.

5. Links to Relevant Content:
   - FAQ: [FAQ Page](https://www.zonnepanelen-xtra.nl/faq/)
   - Reviews: [Reviews Page](https://beoordelingen.mtmo.nl/zonnepanelen-xtra.nl)

6. Professional Layout: Maintain a clean and professional layout for the page, including logos and relevant images, to uphold the brand identity.

7. Call-to-Action (CTA): Include a clear call-to-action that encourages users to take further action, such as following the company on social media or exploring other pages on the website.

Reference Example: A good example to reference is Solar Concept's Thank You Page (https://www.solarconcept.nl/bedankt-voor-offerteaanvraag-besparing-berekenen). While they include a video, Solar Xtra does not have one. However, it provides a visual representation of the desired layout and elements.

---

Notes:
- The thank you page should reflect the brand's tone and style.

work_histories.description:
Hi freelancer,

We've got an exciting project on our hands – creating a killer webpage for Airco Xtra's Mitsubishi airco models. Here are the deets:

Client: Airco Xtra  
Word Count Content: 600  
Type: Informative Landing Page  
Current URL: https://www.airco-xtra.nl/mitsubishi/

Objective:
Craft a detailed brand page focusing on Mitsubishi airco models. Showcase not just our expertise but also create an engaging experience. We want our visitors to feel informed and convinced.

Audience:

work_histories.title: Designing a step-by-step quotation form
work_histories.description:
Hi freelancer,

We're thrilled to share details about an exciting project for Solar Xtra, focusing on creating a step-by-step quote form for their website. The aim is to make a user-friendly process that smoothly captures potential customers. Each step unfolds across various pages, demanding thoughtful design considerations. Here's a breakdown of the design specifics:

Step 1: Introduction and Initial Details
This first step is a brief introduction and gathers basic information. Importantly, it's already part of the website, so there's no additional design needed here.

Step 2: Household Consumption
Give users space to input the number of people in their household and the kWh consumed. A backend calculator will handle the calculations.

Step 3: Roof Details
In this stage, users specify their roof type (slanted or flat), orientation (wind direction), and dimensions (length and width). Implement four input fields to collect these details.

Step 4: Quote and Contact
This pivotal step presents users with information on potential solar panels, energy generated, yearly savings, and the payback period. Also, gather essential visitor information - first name, last name, email, and phone number. This stage essentially marks their request for a quote before returning to the website.

It's crucial to ensure that the form is intuitive, providing a smooth user experience. Our goal is to prevent potential customers from dropping off due to complex forms. Take inspiration from the user-friendly form at [Solar Concept](https://www.solarconcept.nl/home/a).

Refer to the concept design https://www.figma.com/file/zaTMk0pUXVVLjgaFWhco3R/Untitled?type=design&node-id=0-1&mode=design&t=FLx1gQBrYBvFcHA3-0 for clarity, illustrating the multiple steps and pages involved.

Lastly, make sure the design aligns seamlessly with the style of Solar Xtra's new homepage.

Let's work together to create an exceptional quote form!

Best regards,

Jorn

work_histories.title: Enhancing SEO Landing Page
work_histories.description:
Project Brief: Enhancing SEO Landing Page


Project Objective:
The objective of this project is to optimize the SEO landing page at the URL: https://onwise.nl/zoekmachine-optimalisatie/ to improve user engagement, highlight the unique selling points of our SEO services, and encourage visitors to take action.


Current State Analysis:
- The current landing page lacks an attractive header and introduction.
- It is not distinct from competitors' pages.
- It does not effectively invite visitors to explore further.
- There is no clear call-to-action (CTA) on the page.
- Testimonials from satisfied clients are missing.
- Experience and certifications are not prominently displayed.
- It's unclear which tools are utilized.


Desired Outcome:
- Visitors should gain a clear understanding of our expertise as an SEO specialist and the specific services offered.
- They should feel confident that they have found the right solution for their SEO needs.
- The landing page should reflect us as qualified professionals in the field.


Benchmarking:
A good example to follow is the landing page at https://victorious.com/, which demonstrates:

- Intuitive design.
- Attractive header.
- Concise introduction highlighting unique selling points.
- Clear CTA to a low-barrier offer.
- Easy contact options.
- Explanation of SEO methodology and offered services.
- Success stories or testimonials from previous clients.
- Display of experience and certifications.
- Mention of specific tools used.
- Inclusion of a blog section for updates and tips.


Proposed Solutions:
1. Develop a compelling title and introduction emphasizing the unique aspects of our SEO services.
2. Highlight our unique selling points in a USP bar. For now, name them USP 1, 2 and 3. 
3. Strategically place clear CTAs for a free SEO audit.
4. Showcase positive testimonials from satisfied clients.
5. Emphasize our experience and certifications (FD Gazellen, Emerce 100, Google Premier Partner )prominently.
6. Mention the use of specific SEO tools (Screaming Frog, SE Ranking, Ahrefs, SEMrush).
7. Ensure sub-service links remain visible  (SEO Content, Linkbuilding, Zoekwoorden Onderzoek etc.)
8. Add a content block detailing our methodology.
9. Incorporate FAQs smoothly into the page.


Considerations:
- Retain the original photo material.
- Maintain the blog section on the page.
- Keep "meet the team" section accessible.
- Preserve the header and footer.
- Maintain styling consistency with the original design.


Timeline:
The project is expected to be completed within a week, but first concept within a day.

All the best!

work_histories.title: Solar Panels Thank You Page
work_histories.description:
Briefing for Solar Xtra Thank You Page

Objective: The purpose of this project is to create a thank you page for Solar Xtra, which visitors will land on after requesting a quote for solar panel installation services. The page should effectively convey gratitude, confirm the user's action, provide information about next steps, offer optional social sharing, include links to relevant content, maintain a professional layout, and incorporate a clear call-to-action.

Key Points to Include:

1. Clear Thank You Message: Ensure the message of gratitude is clear and sincere. Utilize friendly and polite language to express appreciation.

2. Confirmation of Action: Clearly reference the specific action the user has taken, in this case, requesting a quote.

3. Information about Next Steps: Inform users about the next steps, such as waiting for a callback from Solar Xtra.

4. Optional Social Shareability: Provide the option to share the thank you page on social media platforms to encourage users to share their experience and motivate others to take similar actions.

5. Links to Relevant Content:
   - FAQ: [FAQ Page](https://www.zonnepanelen-xtra.nl/faq/)
   - Reviews: [Reviews Page](https://beoordelingen.mtmo.nl/zonnepanelen-xtra.nl)

6. Professional Layout: Maintain a clean and professional layout for the page, including logos and relevant images, to uphold the brand identity.

7. Call-to-Action (CTA): Include a clear call-to-action that encourages users to take further action, such as following the company on social media or exploring other pages on the website.

Reference Example: A good example to reference is Solar Concept's Thank You Page (https://www.solarconcept.nl/bedankt-voor-offerteaanvraag-besparing-berekenen). While they include a video, Solar Xtra does not have one. However, it provides a visual representation of the desired layout and elements.

---

Notes:
- The thank you page should reflect the brand's tone and style.

Scope of Work:

UI/UX design for web and mobile applications
Creation of conversion-focused landing pages (B2C)
Collaborating closely with our team to ensure project success

What We Need:

Proven experience in UI/UX design with a focus on web and mobile
Proficiency in Figma and/or Plasmic
Strong understanding of user experience principles and best conversion practices
Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills
German language skills are a plus
Ability to work independently while also collaborating effectively with team members
Attention to detail and the ability to meet tight deadlines

Additional Requirements:

Good understanding of different brands and the ability to adapt designs accordingly
Experience in logo designing, creating unique and memorable brand identities

Potential for More Work:

Successful completion of this project may lead to additional opportunities to work on exciting projects with our team in the future. We value long-term collaborations and are always looking for talented designers to join our extended team.

Scope of Work:

UI/UX design for web and mobile applications
Creation of conversion-focused landing pages (B2C)
Collaborating closely with our team to ensure project success
Delivering exceptional design solutions that meet client expectations

What We Need:

Proven experience in UI/UX design with a focus on web and mobile
Proficiency in Figma and/or Plasmic
Strong understanding of user experience principles and best conversion practices
Fluent in English, with excellent communication skills
German language skills are a plus
Ability to work independently while also collaborating effectively with team members
Attention to detail and the ability to meet tight deadlines

Additional Requirements:

Good understanding of different brands and the ability to adapt designs accordingly
Experience in logo designing, creating unique and memorable brand identities

Potential for More Work:

Successful completion of this project may lead to additional opportunities to work on exciting projects with our team in the future. We value long-term collaborations and are always looking for talented designers to join our extended team.

Please submit your application with a portfolio showcasing your previous UI/UX design projects.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. We can't wait to collaborate with you!

work_histories.title: UI/UX Designer for Social Media - Web / Mobile / CarPlay
work_histories.description:
We're looking for a great designer and user experience professional to take over design work on our popular social media application.

Our app works on mobile (android + iOS), web, and mobile web.

We have several new features and enhancements planned, and we need a new designer to help us from week-to-week iterating design concepts.

One of the new features we plan to implement is CarPlay, for our in-app navigation features! Designers with CarPlay experience or knowledge are welcome to this job.

Our current designs are based in Figma. You should be fully proficient and expert in Figma.

We are looking for a professional who:
- Communicates and organizes well
- Has flexibility to put a few hours throughout the week, as we iterate forward in design and provide feedback
- Anticipates user experience, flows, and responsiveness across various devices
- Works to understand the concept and context of features, in order to design a more usable and thoughtful experience
- Provides alternative ideas. We need a thinker, not a robot.

Looking for approximately 4-8 hours per week, possibly a bit more in the beginning for new features under consideration. If this works out well, we may retain for longer term design maintenance.

Brokkr Labs LLC is a cutting-edge technology consulting firm specializing in Cloud, DevOps, Security, and Automation solutions. We're dedicated to bringing innovative solutions to small and medium-sized businesses across various industries, including retail, healthcare, manufacturing, and financial services. Through strategic partnerships with industry leaders like AWS and active participation in industry communities, we aim to extend our market reach and establish ourselves as thought leaders in the tech space.

work_histories.title: Mobile App Designer for Astrology App
work_histories.description:
We are embarking on an exciting journey to develop an astrology-themed mobile application and invite an imaginative and skilled mobile app designer to join us for a trial project. This initial phase focuses on the creation of a captivating home screen that sets the tone for our app's overall design. We are seeking someone with a robust grasp of mobile app design principles who can translate these into an aesthetically pleasing and intuitive interface.

During this trial, you will collaborate closely with our development team to brainstorm and design an inviting home screen, featuring innovative layouts, icons, and graphics. An essential aspect of this role is to conduct research on similar apps in the app store to draw inspiration and understand current trends. Your designs should not only be visually striking but also infused with elements reflective of astrology, showcasing your creativity and meticulous attention to detail.

Skills required for this trial project include:

- Proficiency in mobile app design
- Strong UI/UX design capabilities
- Graphic design expertise
- A solid understanding of astrology concepts
- Creativity and a keen eye for detail

This trial is an opportunity for us to work together and envision the future of our astrology app. We look forward to seeing how you blend functionality with aesthetic appeal in your design.

work_histories.title: UI UX Designer for Mobile/Web for Trading app
work_histories.client_feedback: "Meeta and team were extremely professional. They did a high-quality job. She was reachable, communication was clear and the deliverables were absolutely on time. It is a great experience working with Meeta and we are sure to work on many more projects with her."
work_histories.description:
Nu10 Technologies is looking for an experienced and talented UI designer to design and shape unique, user-centric product for a trading/gaming mobile and Web app.  The ideal candidate will have experience working in agile teams, with developers, UX designers, and content writers. You will be able to make deliberate design decisions and to translate any given user-experience journey into a smooth and intuitive interaction.

Responsibilities
1. Translate concepts into user flows, wireframes, mockups, and prototypes that lead to intuitive user experiences.
2. Facilitate the client’s product vision by researching, conceiving, sketching, prototyping, and user-testing experiences for digital products.
3. Design and deliver wireframes, user stories, user journeys, and mockups optimized for a wide range of devices and interfaces.
4. Be a great team player, experienced in working with agile teams. Ability to collaborate closely with developers and other team members.
5. Create, improve and use wireframes, prototypes, style guides, user flows, and effectively communicate your interaction ideas using any of these methods.
6. Present and defend your design decisions. All your design decisions should be based on the overall design roadmap as well as your own design thinking and fundamental principles (i.e. color theory, visual weight, etc.)


Requirements
Three or more years of experience and a proven track record.
Hands-on experience creating wireframes, prototypes, storyboards, user flows, etc.
Experience using tools such as Figma, Sketch, Illustrator, Zeplin.
Ability to work with clients to understand detailed requirements and design complete user experiences that meet client needs and vision.
Extensive experience in using UX design best practices to design solutions, and a deep understanding of mobile-first and responsive design.
Ability to iterate designs and solutions efficiently and intelligently.

Ability to clearly and effectively communicate design processes, ideas, and solutions to teams and clients.
A clear understanding of the importance of user-centered design and design thinking.
Be open to receiving feedback and constructive criticism.

About Nu10
We are a Web3 first company designing elegant solutions using blockchain in gaming, finance and supply chain industries. We are a 220+ people strong company delivering complex projects to enterprises and start-ups. Work with us to work on exciting projects.

work_histories.title: Flexible and Creative Graphic/UX Designer Freelancer for Growing Start Up
work_histories.description:
About Us:
We're a fast-growing marketplace startup based in lovely Melbourne, Australia. We work in the Aged Care and Disability space specializing in guiding and matching care providers with customer needs. Navigating the Aged Care and Disability space is wildly overwhelming, it's our mission to make this stressful time as easy as possible for our customers. 

Overview: 
Looking for a versatile designer who has experience in landing page design, email, and website. Preferably someone who is familiar with WordPress, Marketo, and Salesforce. A strong UX background is ideal! 

Our businesses is at the stage where we do not need a full-time designer, but we're getting close. As a result, this consultant will be somewhat an extension of the team and be in touch with our Marketing Manager fairly regularly through Slack. 

All of our projects will be outlined and provided through briefs. Because of this, being on the same time zone is ideal, but not a requirement. 

Looking for a responsive, collaborative and friendly helping hand to build assets that will help thousands with Aged Care and disability needs across Australia.

work_histories.title: UX/UI Designer Needed for New Website Platform (software-based - includes login, dashboards, etc.)
work_histories.client_feedback: "Great communication. Easy to work with. Very professional. Always goes the extra mile."
work_histories.description:
Website specifications 


Looking for a quote and consultation for a new website for a new business. We are looking to understand the cost and timeframe to complete a website with the following specifications, roughly. 


The site will serve as a hub for peer-to-peer transactions and exchanges. To that end, it will need the following functionality: 
•	Paid member account system (sign up / log in) (subscription-based)
•	Customized dashboard showing account holder’s history on site (past transactions, etc.)
•	Registration into a database with approximately seven main categories or types, which each require about 30 – 40 data fields.
o	This will create a public profile 
•	Basic messaging system 
•	Rating of the public profiles by other users 
•	LinkedIn verification 
•	Back end for administrator (site owner) editing of site text 
•	User uploading verification documents (3 – 10 documents)



We want to build the site for an expectation of about 100,000 account holders and up to two million profiles created. 


We also want to know time and the cost if we wanted to add, in a second phase, peer-to-peer payment ability. As well as escrow capabilities from our (site owner) side. 

Outside of the “database generated” pages (eg, dashboards, transaction pages, profiles, etc.), the site will have about 25 pages (eg, “about us,” terms, “how it works,” etc.) that should be high-end in terms of design, animations, and embedded videos. 


Please help us understand what is driving the price and timeframe you quote. For instance, which specific elements are particularly costly, in time or money, and what type adaptations or substitutions might be available that are less costly. 

Thanks so much, for your time.

work_histories.title: UX design suggestions and wireframe development for SaaS MVP
work_histories.description:
Im a software developer looking for UX help to build a MVP for a  new multi-tenant B2B SaaS app. The apps goal is to take current manual processes and digitize them. I have existing concepts and some example PowerPoint slides and reports I want to digitize.

The upwork gig will be to develop a mockup of the SaaS app for an MVP including:
- recommend a typical approach (ex menu bar vs left side menu)
- wireframe it and 5 -10 other pages
- recommend UI theme that a software developer can implement. 

No need to re-invent the wheel. A modern, but common approach is ok. Exact colors, and specific assets not yet needed as this is MVP. Ideal candidate will be able to explain UX design process overall in order to efficiently develop an MVP. Success on this project may lead to further work to develop UX for the app. Multiple designers may be selected for different ideas. Suggestions on tools is welcome (proto vs figma vs balsamic etc). I'm currently creating in proto.io. thr closer to an interactive mockup with some styling the better but basic wireframe is an OK start.

work_histories.title: UX/UI Designer for Content Presentation
work_histories.client_feedback:
"Let me keep this review very short.

Andrii knows his stuff and is one of the best designers I worked with on Upwork."
work_histories.description:
We're looking for a talented and experienced UX/UI designer to help us transform a 5000 - 10000 word product story/information into an engaging, visually appealing, and easy-to-digest online experience. 

The ideal candidate will have a knack for turning text-heavy content into user-friendly and engaging layouts that keep the reader's interest.

Please review the attached file for sample examples.

Responsibilities:

- Transform a text-heavy article into an intuitive, user-friendly digital experience.
- Incorporate relevant design elements such as icons, graphs, and charts to increase readability and engagement.
- Create and implement an engaging, easy-to-navigate layout for the content.
- Present and justify design decisions based on user-centered design approach and industry best practices.
- Implement a responsive design that works across various device sizes.

Requirements:

- Must provide at least 3 samples of similar work done before. So, a portfolio that demonstrates your ability to transform complex information into visually appealing, user-friendly designs.
- Excellent understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices.
- Ability to take feedback and make necessary revisions.
- Excellent attention to detail.
- Strong communication and time-management skills.
- Experience in the health and wellness or dietary supplements industry is a plus.

All bids that do not follow the instructions will be ignored.

- Present and justify design decisions based on user-centered design approach and industry best practices.
- Implement a responsive design that works across various device sizes.

Requirements:

- Must provide at least 3 samples of similar work done before. So, a portfolio that demonstrates your ability to transform complex information into visually appealing, user-friendly designs.
- Excellent understanding of user-centered design principles and best practices.
- Ability to take feedback and make necessary revisions.
- Excellent attention to detail.
- Strong communication and time-management skills.
- Experience in the health and wellness or dietary supplements industry is a plus.

All bids that do not follow the instructions will be ignored.

work_histories.title: Looking for an Excellent web UI/UX designer
Web Designer for eComm Landing Pages
work_histories.client_feedback: "Communication was excellent. Talented and easy to work with! Will hire him again soon."
work_histories.description:
We are seeking an excellent web UI/UX designer to join our team for a short-term project of less than 1 month. The ideal candidate should possess a strong background in GUI design, web design, UI graphics, prototyping, custom web design, user-centered design, responsive design, web component design, mobile UI design, and interaction design.

As a UI/UX designer, you will be responsible for creating visually appealing and user-friendly web interfaces. Your expertise in understanding user needs and translating them into intuitive designs will be crucial to the success of this project.

To apply, please submit a detailed proposal outlining how you can contribute to this project. We would like to see examples of your past completed projects, so please include links to your portfolio or relevant work samples.

We look forward to reviewing your proposals and working with a talented UI/UX designer who can bring our web design vision to life.

work_histories.title: Redesign of a relationship intelligence / CRM landing page and product
work_histories.description:
W're looking for a talented designer to help us redesign our relationship intelligence/CRM landing page and product. The ideal candidate must have expertise in Figma,

As a designer, you will be responsible for creating a visually appealing and user-friendly landing page that attracts potential customers and highlights the unique features of our product. You will also be in charge of creating user flows and product mockups.

Please mention any relevant web or product design skills upon application.

work_histories.title: Talented UI/UX designer needed to improve design of current web application
work_histories.client_feedback: "We were happy with Andrii's work and look forward to working with him again in the future."
work_histories.description: This is initially a short-term project but we would like to form a partnership with someone that we can approach on an ongoing basis for similar requests in the future. We have a web application that is currently in use by multiple users however we are looking at releasing a new feature in the application that facilitates collaborations between a group of users with chat, file sharing and other aspects included. We are looking for a talented designer who can help us come up with a fresh, user-friendly look. Please share a link to your prior design work or portfolio if you have one. Experience with software/web applications is required.

work_histories.title: Data Visualization
work_histories.description: We have a lot of data for presentation materials and dashboards that we need a designer for. So we are specifically looking for someone with the skill set to take boring excel formatted data and turn it into beautiful/digestible information.

work_histories.title: Web Design and Pardot Landing Pages
UI/UX Designer for Fantasy Sports Cross Platform Mobile App
work_histories.client_feedback: "Andrii did a great job on the samples. Thank you again for your fast response and quick work!"
work_histories.description:
We have an existing UI from our BETA and we are looking at taking it to the next level.  We want to take our current MVP/Beta which is very basic and give it some new life.

We like the current flow of the app and how it works but we want to amp up the design while keeping the function.  Our first part of the project will be to help design a new quick play game for the app. We have an existing UI team you will need to work with based in India.  We are looking for designers with experience with American based Sports. NFL, NBA, MLB,NHL, Golf, NCAA Football, NCAA Basketball.

Hourly rate should be quoted based on experience and skill.

DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES:
•Take direction from application architect
• Create user-friendly wireframes of screens, pop ups and features
• Continue and develop the visual style of the UI of the game
• Prepare UI assets and implement them directly into the Xamarin. Forms project or Provide the Assest to the developers
• Align with our game designers to ensure the new UI fits into the game’s experience.
• Work closely with team to create wireframes user-flows and interfaces for our sport fantasy draft game.
• Understand how digital and physical experiences blend together.
• Evolve rough ideas into polished user flows and pixel-perfect interfaces
• Conceive transitions and animated effects to enhance gameplay and tutorials
• Discover what matters to users and help determine not just what things look like, but
how they work and what we build next
• Predict, identify, and resolve experience design issues that could impede player
experience in your general product area
• Conduct and interpret user tests and interviews to identify user behavior and areas to
optimize user experience
• Participate in daily stand-up 7AM EST Calls

work_histories.client_feedback: "Great freelancer. Followed instructions and did everything timely on a task with time sensitivity."

work_histories.title: Create Hidden pages on Sitebuilder website
work_histories.description:
We require 50 hidden pages to be entered on to sitebuilder for our website. We have the product list to go as well as key words to enter. The freelancer will be required to do the following:

1) To create hidden pages and to upload image of the product (we will provide), short paragraph of product. Will provide examples from our current hidden pages as a guidance.
2) On the site menu navigation please ensure the page is hidden for mobile and desktop as we need to approve pages before publishing. The products should not be shown on the public website.

3) To enter title, description of product, keywords under "manage pages"

work_histories.title: Experienced WordPress Developer Needed: Composer, GIT & Full Stack Magic!
work_histories.description:
Project Description:
We're searching for a seasoned WordPress developer to join our team and contribute to exciting projects! You'll be working on building, customising, and maintaining high-quality websites, ensuring exceptional performance and user experience.

Key Responsibilities:

Develop custom themes and plugins using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Leverage Composer for dependency management and package updates.
Utilize GIT for version control and collaboration.
Implement best practices for secure coding and development environment.
Optimize websites for speed and responsiveness across all devices.
Troubleshoot and fix WordPress issues efficiently.
Work closely with designers and stakeholders to translate vision into reality.
Stay up-to-date with the latest WordPress trends and technologies.

Qualifications:
Essential:
3+ years of experience as a WordPress developer.
Proficient in PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Experience with Composer and GIT.
Strong understanding of WordPress security best practices.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Effective communication and collaboration abilities.

Desirable:
Experience with WooCommerce, Gravity Forms or other popular plugins.
Familiarity with custom post types and taxonomies.
Understanding of performance optimisation techniques.
Experience with headless WordPress setup.

Project Details:
Project type: Ongoing (with potential for long-term collaboration)
Budget: Negotiable (please share your expected hourly rate)
Start date: ASAP

work_histories.title: Web Developer for a Junk Removal Business
work_histories.description:
Seeking Web Developer for SEO-Optimized Junk Removal Website

We're looking for a skilled web developer to create a fairly basic junk removal website optimized for local search engine visibility. Our goal is to attract customers locally and provide a seamless experience for scheduling and information gathering.

The website should include service pages highlighting our offerings and a user-friendly interface. We're open to design suggestions that resonate with our brand's values of eco-friendly and efficient junk removal.

**SEO Requirements:** It's crucial that the website ranks well in local search results. We're seeking expertise in local SEO strategies, including keyword research, on-page optimization, and local citations to ensure maximum visibility among our target audience.

**Target Audience:** Our ideal customers are local residents and businesses seeking hassle-free junk removal services. We pride ourselves on prompt, environmentally conscious solutions and want the website to reflect these values to resonate with our audience.

**Portfolio and Experience:** Please provide examples of previous projects showcasing your experience in developing SEO-friendly local service websites, particularly in the junk removal or similar service industry.

**Communication:** Effective communication is key. We prefer regular updates and value collaboration throughout the project.

We're excited to collaborate with a passionate web developer who can bring our vision to life while boosting our online presence in [Your Local Area]. Looking forward to reviewing your proposals!

work_histories.title: Expert WordPress Web Designer Needed for Dog Niche One-Product Webshop
work_histories.description:
Hello talented web designers! I'm seeking an experienced and creative individual to quickly create a fully responsive and effective one-product webshop for my dog niche using WordPress. If you have a keen eye for design, a proven track record of building successful e-commerce websites, and can deliver results efficiently, I want to hear from you.

Key Requirements:

Full Responsiveness:

Develop a fully responsive webshop that ensures a seamless user experience across all devices.
Effective Landing Page:

Design an engaging landing page that captivates visitors and smoothly guides them towards making a purchase.
Implement a "slippery slide" approach to encourage swift navigation and conversion.

Content and Information:

Incorporate necessary information about the product on the landing page.
Utilize provided product pictures, logo, and text to create compelling content that showcases the product's features.

Neat and Eye-Catching Layout:

Craft a clean and visually appealing layout that highlights the product's strengths.
Ensure the hierarchy of the page structure is intuitive and enhances the overall user experience.
Strategic Call-to-Action (CTA) Buttons:

Strategically place CTA buttons for optimal conversion.
Use an expert e-commerce perspective to determine the most effective placement for these buttons.
Inspiration Example:

Take inspiration from the following product page: Example Product Page

What I'll Provide:

Product pictures
Logo
Texts

Your Responsibilities:

Infuse creativity into the design, keeping an expert e-commerce perspective in mind.
Deliver a webshop that not only looks great but also functions seamlessly.
If you're passionate about creating visually stunning and effective e-commerce websites, I'd love to see examples of your previous work. Please include your portfolio in your proposal, and let's create an outstanding one-product webshop for the dog niche together!

Looking forward to working with you!

work_histories.title: Website Graphic Designer Needed to design Wordpress Websites (PSDs)
work_histories.description:
We're looking to add an outstanding graphic designer to our web team. Dijify have built over 4000 websites in the last 8 years, so we know what we need. 

The role will be to create beautiful web pages in Photoshop or Illustrator for our developers to then convert to websites.

I'd prefer to work with an individual who loves what they do rather than an agency. Location isn't important, but style, communication and adherence to deadlines is vital.

If you're interested please send us the following. Missing anything on this list will result in your bid being rejected:

1. Sample of previous work (min 3)
2. How long it took you to do each piece of work
3. How much you'd charge for each piece of work

Also, just to make sure you have read this far before bidding please start your message with 'DESIGN620'.

Thanks, Iain

work_histories.title: Developer needed to update my wordpress website, add new products and add some affiliate links
work_histories.description:
I have a website called Real Beauty Reviews, but I really need someone to clean it up... more attractive, easier to use and find products etc.  I also need someone to add new products as I will be working with https://rakutenadvertising.com/ and associated beauty brands.   My goal is to post a review to my social media pages, drive them to my website, where they can click the buy now and be taken to my associated/affiliate beauty brands (where I get paid commission).  

I am looking for someone with experience in ecommerce and affiliate marketing that I can work quickly with, excellent communication is key.  I have not yet worked out a budget for this, i am looking for quotes nz and worldwide.  Ideally I would like to get my first affiliate brand in and then if we work well together be sending you new work every month.  As I also have 2 other businesses that need attending to. 

I am honest and fair.  Passionate about everything I do.  My previous business i had for 16 years and had the same staff members for 16 years.  I am moving with the times and could work this out myself; but isn't it better to share the load and get it moving...

work_histories.title: New UI/UX required for golf cart management platform
work_histories.description:
We are a company which provides GPS for golf carts. Our current platform is dated and based on javascript/HTML/CSS technology (which we plan on continuing to use). The actual UI of our tracking page is very dated and we require some design ideas to modernize the look and feel of the GPS tracking page. See attached our current tracking page.

We are looking for a refresh of this page which is a bit more interactive and feel to it. We track golf carts around a map (looking for a fresh look, icon change?), we have GPS status information, we can send messages to each cart, there is a reporting module which can be enhanced plus more.

We will provide access to the actual page for development purposes to the right candidate.

work_histories.title: Full-stack web developer for WordPress Blog
work_histories.description:
I am a holistic practitioner looking to establish my clientele primarily online. This includes both static and dynamic webpages, with specific outcomes. This project does will include continued up and down scaling depending on budget and time.

I am looking to work with one person with who I can establish trust, respect, understanding and dependability. Clear communication is of critical importance.

It is important to note that I have a third party theme installed on my WP with Elementor and Slider Revolution.

The following is a basic outline of the main components that need to be setup and DOES NOT include all tasks in detail.

Phase 1 Tasks:
- Setup Menu to include specific webpages
- Setup Blog
- Setup Instagram feed to website
- Setup Facebook feed to widget


Phase 2 Tasks:
- Setup Client Portal
- Setup JotForm restricted access via Client Portal
- Setup iCal with JotForm for client to view and select available appointment time
- Setup payment gateway with JotForm in Client Portal

Phase 3 Tasks: To be discussed based on up scaling which will include international localizations.

Please Note: For Phase 1 Tasks... I will need an outline of how to update and make minor changes myself. 

In your proposal, please share a brief summary of your experience and tell us about a recent full stack web development project you worked on.

work_histories.title: UX/UI designer
work_histories.client_feedback:
"Khrystyna is able to produce a lot of views quickly, understand the client need, really friendly and communicative, I recommend!
We used Miro, Figma and Notion. 
She knows how to use those tools well, and communicate about the process of her work"
work_histories.description:
Hello everyone!

We are a startup working on a mobile and web application that helps people on their online dating and social experiences.
We are looking for a UX/UI designer to help with the website, to complete our team of 2 mobile developers, 2 community managers, one designer (focused on mobile UI/UX), a backend Engineer (myself) and CEO. Almost everyone in the team lives in Paris, but we are all fluent in English.

The web platform that needs to be designed, will be service-oriented, focusing on providing dating app and social media photography services.
If you have experience in mobile UI/UX we may give you task to design those services for the mobile app.

We use Figma and Notion for the task management system.
We are in an Agile development system. 
The notion task is associated to Figma and Notion, this way you can keep track about the features implemented.

Responsibilities:
* Design a visually appealing, easy-to-navigate website.
* Develop UX/UI that enhances user interaction and overall experience.
* Collaborate with our team to align the website’s design with our mobile application’s aesthetic and functionality.
* Create responsive design prototypes.

Project Details:
* Start Date: Immediately
* Duration: 3 months with the possibility of extension
* Workload: 30 hours+ per week
* Location: Remote

Best regards,
Eren

work_histories.title: Design landing pages and user interfaces in figma
work_histories.client_feedback: "Khrystyna has successfully completed my design project. I want to point out her fairness and flexibility. She prioritizes the client's experience first, which I appreciate a lot in contractors."
work_histories.description:
I need a rebel who can create beautiful landing pages and user interfaces in figma.

My ideal design handyman would be:
- Talented designer (Show your best portfolio works even unreal ones, I don't care)
- Precise (No inconsistent paddings or inconsistent fonts)
- Intuitive (Doesn't need to be told what to do)
- Proactive (OK to go the extra mile to deliver high-quality work)
- Fair on pricing (Won't log 2 hours for a small change)
- No ego (Won't get upset if is told that design is shit 😁)
- Fast (Won't take 3 days to make a simple page structure)
- Direct (Don't be afraid to tell what you think)
- Cooperative (Do what you have been told to do even if you disagree)

This is the work ethic needed to become a world-class designer or, apparently, any other professional. If you don't agree with it, please skip this proposal and keep being mediocre.

Experience Needed:
- 2 years in design (Apparently web)
- Figma Prototyping, UI kit, Components, Autolayout, Color palettes etc...
- Ability to make creatives, illustrations, and icons. Finding those assets in stock is fine, but you should be able to customize them to make them look authentic and cool asf.
- 3D spline or blender experience (a big plus)
- GPT prompt engineering (to make content drafts, create visuals, research)
- A basic understanding of html/css will be a plus (so you understand how the page is built and what are the constraints when designing)

Your English
- Spoken: You don't have to speak fluently, but you have to understand what I say.
- Written: Good. there are a number of tools you can use to improve your text chatting. 
- English in Designs: Typos in High-Fidelity are unacceptable; I don't want to look stupid in front of a client when presenting it. 

Gender/Color of skin/Sexual orientation: I don't care, even if you are extraterrestrial, but if your design is awful, our ways are split.

Tell me your favorite music band and movie so you won't end up deleted.

It's gonna be tough but very fun! 😎
Let's go World-Class!!!

work_histories.title: Senior UI/UX Designer Wanted Business Card Design Project
work_histories.client_feedback: "Khrystyna showcased exceptional proficiency in creating the Business Card, extending her expertise to assist with numerous additional matters. I wholeheartedly endorse her as an exceptional expert, distinguished by her remarkable abilities and high efficiency. Her professional conduct is commendable, and I will undoubtedly seek her services again for future design needs. Engaging her is a decision you will surely not regret!"
work_histories.description:
Role Overview:
As a Senior UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for the end-to-end design of our new business card. This project requires a creative individual who can blend modern design trends with our company's unique branding to create a memorable and impactful business card.

Key Responsibilities:

Collaborate closely with our marketing and design teams to understand the brand, its values, and the message we wish to convey through our business card.
Develop and present multiple design concepts that reflect our brand identity and are aligned with current design trends.
Create a user-centric design that is not only visually appealing but also functional, ensuring that all key information is easily accessible and legible.
Refine selected design concepts based on feedback, and prepare final design files for print.
Ensure the final design is optimized for printing, considering the choice of materials, finishes, and print methods.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Senior UI/UX Designer, with a strong portfolio showcasing previous design work, including print and digital media.
Expertise in design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) and familiarity with print design standards.
Strong understanding of branding, typography, color theory, and composition.
Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate design choices and collaborate effectively with non-design team members.
Attention to detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality design solutions.
Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
What We Offer:

The opportunity to work on a high-visibility project for a leading company in its field.
A collaborative and supportive work environment.
Competitive compensation.
Creative freedom to express your design philosophy.

work_histories.title: UI/UX Designer
work_histories.client_feedback:
"I would like to share my impressions of working with Khrystyna and her work as a UI/UX designer. I was extremely impressed with the work she did and I would like to express my appreciation for his high level of professionalism and talent.

From the first day of cooperation, it became obvious that he is a real expert in his domain. She demonstrated a deep understanding of not only design principles, but also the user needs and business goals of the project. Her ability to translate concepts and ideas into attractive and functional interfaces was impressive.

Also, the UI/UX designer was very open to collaboration and communication. She carefully listened to our wishes and comments, and skillfully incorporated them into the design. Her professional attitude to feedback and flexibility in taking into account our wishes were incredibly useful for the successful implementation of the project.

I cannot fail to mention his creative approach to work. The UI/UX designer not only fulfilled the project requirements, but also offered innovative solutions and ideas that significantly improved the user experience and aesthetics of the product. Her ability to solve problems and quickly respond to requirements ensured the successful completion of the project on time and with an excellent result.

As a result of our joint work, we received a design that not only met all of our needs and expectations, but exceeded them. The work of the UI/UX designer was a key factor in creating a high-quality product that received positive feedback from users.

Thanks to Khrystyna, we received not only an excellent design, but also a pleasant experience of cooperation."

work_histories.description:
Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Senior UI/UX Designer to create an innovative and impactful logo for our food delivery company. The ideal candidate will have a strong portfolio demonstrating expertise in logo design and brand identity, with a keen eye for modern aesthetics and the ability to convey our company's ethos visually.

Responsibilities:

Design a unique, memorable logo that reflects the essence of our food delivery service.
Collaborate with our marketing team to understand our brand values, target audience, and market positioning.
Utilize advanced design skills to create a logo that is visually appealing and communicates our brand identity effectively.
Provide multiple design concepts and work iteratively based on feedback.
Ensure the final logo is scalable and versatile, suitable for use across various mediums and platforms.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a Senior UI/UX Designer, specifically in logo design and brand development.
Strong portfolio showcasing expertise in creating compelling brand identities.
Proficiency in design software (e.g., Adobe Creative Suite) and understanding of design principles.
Ability to translate branding strategies into unique and innovative visual representations.
Excellent communication skills, with the ability to present concepts and justify design decisions.
Attention to detail, creativity, and a problem-solving mindset.
If you are passionate about design and eager to create a logo that will be the face of our brand, we would love to hear from you. Please apply with your portfolio and a brief explanation of how your skills and experience align with our needs.

Feel free to customize the job post further to match your specific requirements or company culture.

work_histories.title: Futuristic 3d control panel design
work_histories.description:
Need design for a control panel with a futuristic/plush-spaceship aesthetic. Wanting 3d obj/fbx + a few high-resolution renders w/basic lighting/reflection effects.

Ideally want renders to show a few oblique angles (less important, done as if camera is a few feet away from the control panel angled towards it) and top-down (most-important, done as if camera is directly above the panel).

Hoping for something that includes some subtle soft glow/lighting effects around each of the panes in the control panel. Actual panel should be a very plush/smooth, high-gloss, reflective, white lacquer kind of aesthetic. Something halfway between Eva in Wall-E and the look/feel of the corridor design in the movie Moon (2009):
https://www.rogerebert.com/reviews/moon-2009

Don't need any additional environmental/scene based objects or backgrounds. Just the isolated panel. Panel dimensions are roughly the size of a 27" computer monitor with 5 separate panes. An ultra-basic pane layout guide is attached.

work_histories.title: [German-speaking] Product Manager / UX Designer with Figma Experience
work_histories.description:
Hey there! 

We are Lumaly.de & have more than 500,000 users in Germany enjoying our easy browser extension to save money while shopping online.

Now we also want to release an IOS/Android App where our users can browse for deals, earn cashback and complete tasks to earn money. 

For this we are looking for a German-Speaking Product Manager with UX and Figma experience. We do have a english-speaking designer on board who is good at UI and drawing Illustrations etc.

Looking forward to hearing from you! 

Best regards,
Noah

The product will be named Pythagora and we have a logo mockup but the the color palette and the brand identity needs to be created.

After that, we need a design for a website (around 5 pages) and the VS Code extension, which will be basically a frontend for Pythagora.

work_histories.title: Enterprise Client Seeking Visual Designer
work_histories.description:
An Enterprise client is seeking a talented and creative Visual Digital Designer. Your primary responsibility will be to design marketing materials that bring the brand to life and resonate with our target audience. You will be expected to apply a conceptual approach to design, and also have knowledge of UX design principals since most of the work will involve creating layouts and images for emails and web pages. You must be proficient in figma and the Adobe Creative Suite.

Required for this Role:

-must speak fluent english and be willing to work during EST hours roughly 9am-5pm.
-must be available to communicate on Slack during EST hours and meet via zoom to discuss projects a few times a week. 
-willingness to make requested updates to projects on a daily basis.
-Must be able to work in Figma and prepare files to be delivered to a developer.
-Interviews will happen from dec 28- early Jan
-Experience designing for web.
-A portfolio of digital design work showcasing strong visual design skills and creativity.


Responsibilities:

-Produce strong conceptual visuals that are engaging and performance based.
-Design visually appealing marketing materials, including but not limited to emails, infographics, product gifs, and landing pages.
-Collaborate with the team to develop storyboards and/or treatment books
-Adhere to brand guidelines in all design work
-Use advanced knowledge of Photoshop and Illustrator to create high-quality designs
-Employ strategic thinking to align design concepts with business goals
-Create minimal illustrations for company branding and logo design

Other Requirements:

-Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Visual Communication, or a related field.
-Proficiency in Figma, and Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign).
-Strong understanding of design principles, layout, typography, and color theory.
-Ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
-Experience working with cross-functional teams and a proven track record of delivering high-quality designs.
-Basic knowledge of HTML is a plus.


If you are a strong visual storyteller with a passion for visual design please submit your proposal, along with your portfolio for consideration.

work_histories.title: UI/UX Designer to create Figma designs for web app
Need to do a design analysis on a few TV apps
work_histories.client_feedback: "Very prompt work. They understood the design process and delivered a high quality design audit in 3 days."
work_histories.description:
Hello,

I am looking for someone to conduct a mini design audit of how users navigate through various screens for some apps. The purpose is to document the navigation patterns of specific applications when using input devices such as TV remotes or game controllers.

I'd need analysis on 5 apps. Please note that the audit/analysis is needed only for how users navigate these apps using a TV remote or game controller. (specifically the 5 buttons - up, down, right, left and select)

1. Netflix on TV (navigation using TV remote)
2. Disney on TV (navigation using TV remote)
3. Xbox screens (navigation using the game controller)
4. Playstation (navigation using game controller)
5. Pick any app that can be used in TV

The deliverable is a document that includes screenshots and observations of how users navigate from one screen to another, scroll through the page, or select an item on screen using a TV remote or game controller.

Ideally, you'd already have access to the apps, but if not one month of subscription to any of those apps can be reimbursed.

Thank you.

work_histories.title: UI UX design for interactive website for Video Agency
UI/UX Designer for SaaS Application - Ongoing Project
work_histories.description:
The Job Overview

We are seeking a user experience designer to join our design team. We are a web based enterprise product for the Home Remodeling and Construction Industry. Your primary role will be to research and design usable interfaces, perform usability testing, and create prototypes to validate design concepts. The ideal candidate will use this information to help us create the best user experience possible for our website and mobile applications.

Responsibilities

Below are some of the responsibilities a UX designer is expected to assume:  

Leverage a human-centered design process to deliver an easy-to-use user interface and user experience
Research customers, competitors, and products
Develop personas, scenarios, and user stories
Work with stakeholders to identify requirements
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mock-ups
Develop and implement usability testing
Design for accessibility standards
Create and maintain usability documentation
Work with developers to ensure product quality
Work closely with product managers and marketing to maximize customer success
Ensure products are tested with customers and validated against business goals
Job Qualifications and Skill Sets

Below are the qualifications expected of a UX designer:

Bachelor’s degree in computer science, human-computer interaction, interaction design, or a related field
Working knowledge of UX design principles
User interface design
Graphic design tools such as Adobe Photoshop or Illustrator
Wireframing/prototyping tools such as Balsamiq or Sketch
UX design tools such as Figma
Experience with user testing and usability analysis

work_histories.title: Expert UI/UX Designer with CRO Experience
work_histories.client_feedback: "Oleh was a pleasure to work with. He provided us with high-quality outcomes from the start, and was always happy to make changes when required. We would certainly recommend him for his UI/UX services and will be sure to work with him again!"
work_histories.description:
About Us:

We’re Maad House, an award-winning full-service design agency focused on supercharging brands through creative design and strategy. We exist to help our clients express themselves visually, to standout in crowded markets and thrive in the modern world. As a full-service design agency, we provide a comprehensive range of award-winning services that allow us to conceive, create and control all aspects of the surrounding collateral on which our clients visually exist.

---

About You:

- Proficient in Figma, with a deep understanding of Conversion Rate Optimized Design (CRO).

- Fluent in English, with exceptional communication skills.

- Ideally holds a BA or MA in a related subject.

- Based in the UK or Europe.

- A strong portfolio showcasing your exceptional UI/UX design skills.

---

Job Description: 

As a Remote UI/UX Designer at Maad House, you will play a pivotal role in crafting user-centric designs that not only look stunning but also deliver exceptional user experiences. Your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to:

- UI/UX Design: Creating intuitive, visually appealing, and functional user interfaces that align with best practices and CRO principles.

- Prototyping: Developing interactive prototypes to demonstrate the user flow and functionality of digital products.

- User Research: Conducting user research to understand user needs and preferences, and integrating findings into design decisions.

- Wireframing: Creating wireframes and mockups to visualize and iterate on design concepts.

- Usability Testing: Collaborating with the team to conduct usability testing and gather feedback for design enhancements.

- Collaboration: Working closely with cross-functional teams, including developers and product managers, to ensure seamless implementation of designs.

---

Qualifications:

- Proficiency in Figma and a strong understanding of Conversion Rate Optimized Design (CRO).

- Exceptional creativity and a keen eye for detail.

- A portfolio that showcases your ability to create user-centric UI/UX designs.

- Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to translate complex concepts into simple, intuitive interfaces.

- Excellent communication and collaboration skills.

- Ability to work independently and meet project deadlines.

---

Why Maad House?

- Collaborate with a dynamic and award-winning design agency.

- Work remotely, offering flexibility and work-life balance.

- Be part of a team that values creativity and innovation.

- Exciting opportunities for professional growth and development.

If you're a passionate and talented UI/UX Designer with a strong desire to create user experiences that stand out and convert, we want to hear from you! Please submit a proposal if interested and available.

work_histories.title: Looking for a Full-Stack Developer(s) (Email Sending CRM)
work_histories.client_feedback: "The team delivered good work on this PHP development project and I enjoyed working with them. His communication was top-notch, they met all deadlines, and their skills were strong. I enjoyed working with this team and will likely have additional jobs for them in the future."
work_histories.description:
We are seeking a skilled and experienced Full-Stack Developer or Team of Developers to join our team and assist us in building an email sending CRM. This application will consist of various modules with specific functionalities, including a Contacts CRM Module, Segmentation Module, Campaign Scheduling Module, Stats Module, and MTA/ESP Connections Module.

Responsibilities:

- Develop and maintain the Contacts CRM Module to store email contacts and associated fields, accessible via API.

- Implement the Segmentation Module, allowing users to create segments based on previous activity and user-defined criteria.

- Enable users to include and exclude segments based on specific conditions using logical operators.

- Build the Campaign Scheduling Module to provide campaign distribution on MBP domain level, including throttling options for even delivery over time

- Develop the Stats Module to collect and track campaign performance metrics such as opens, clicks, sends, bounces, and spam complaints, accessible via API.

- Implement the MTA/ESP Connections Module, allowing users to create ESP connections, associate them with sending domains, and compose sending segments.


Requirements:

- Proven experience as a Full-Stack Developer, with expertise in front-end and back-end development.

- Proficiency in relevant programming languages and frameworks (e.g., JavaScript, Node.js, React, Python).

- Experience working with APIs and integrating third-party services.

- Strong knowledge of database management systems (e.g., SQL, MongoDB).

- Familiarity with email delivery protocols, SMTP, and ESPs.

- Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.

- Strong communication and teamwork skills.

If you are a talented Full-Stack Developer with a passion for building email-related applications and possess the necessary skills and qualifications, we would love to hear from you. Join our team and contribute to the development of a cutting-edge email marketing sending solution.

A full, detailed technical specification document can be provided to shortlisted applicants.

To apply, please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief description of your relevant experience.

Kate

Existing ERP platform for construction industry. It's pretty technical and includes project management, employee management, P/L, dashboards, approval systems, and more. There are a few new designs as well as some requiring either updating feature-wise, or fleshing out the UI/UX flow so the development team can more easily understand.

I am specifically looking for people who have personally designed enterprise SaaS solutions, project management solutions with lots of intricacies and moving parts. Need someone who can recommend solutions and collaborate.

work_histories.title: UX/UI designer for designing a mobile/web app
work_histories.description:
I am seeking a highly skilled and creative UI/UX Designer. As a UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for designing the user interface and user experience for my app. I need your expertise in creating an intuitive and visually captivating user interface while ensuring a seamless and delightful user experience across various devices and screen sizes. A responsive design to ensure the app works seamlessly on various devices and screen sizes (desktop, mobile, tablet).

Less than 10 screens.

Key Responsibilities:
* Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups for the mobile app.
* Develop the user interface, encompassing layouts, graphics, and visual elements.
* Implement responsive design principles to guarantee flawless functionality on desktop, mobile, and tablet devices.

Qualifications:
* Proven experience as a UI/UX Designer with a strong portfolio showcasing previous mobile app design projects.
* Proficiency in industry-standard design and prototyping tools such as Adobe XD, Sketch, Figma, or InVision.
* A solid grasp of user-centered design principles, coupled with a creative approach to problem-solving.
* Ability to receive and implement feedback effectively to refine and enhance designs.
* Knowledge of mobile app design guidelines for both iOS and Android platforms.

Deliverables:
* Wireframes:
    * High-Fidelity Wireframes: Detailed wireframes that integrate visual elements and interactions.
* Prototypes:
    * Interactive prototypes that enable stakeholders to navigate and experience the app's user journey.
* Visual Design:
    * Creation of a comprehensive Visual Style Guide encompassing color schemes, typography, icons, and imagery.
    * Development of high-fidelity User Interface (UI) designs, including all visual components.
    * Design of custom icons, images, and graphics harmonizing with the app's unique style.
* Responsive Design:
    * Adapting designs to ensure a seamless experience across diverse devices and screen sizes.
* Final Design Deliverables:
    * Delivery of polished and pixel-perfect designs for all app screens.
    * Provision of design assets, including icons and images, in formats optimized for app development.
    * Creation of detailed design handoff documentation for developers, featuring precise measurements, specifications, and assets.
* Documentation:
    * Compilation of comprehensive design documentation, offering insights into design rationale and guidelines for developers.
    * Implementation of version control, ensuring well-organized and labeled design files for tracking changes and iterations.

work_histories.title: UX/UI for a Beauty App
work_histories.client_feedback: "Ekaterina is great to work with. She provides quality work in a very short time, which has been completly aligned with the brief and the expectations."
work_histories.description:
We’re looking to onboard a designer on a long term project for complete design of a Beauty mobile app. 

However, before proceeding with the project, we need an initial screen to understand if we can be a good match for this project. 

The app needs to have a sophisticated style, using a Swiss typeface and black/white as primary colours. I believe Sephora is a good reference. 

The scope of this mini-project is the initial navigation where the user will set their preferences before viewing the product list. 

It would be great if the designer can also provide a moodboard, explanation of the design decisions as part of the storytelling and references from previous work. 

Experience in the industry or shopping apps with advanced filtering is valued. 

We hope for a successful mini collaboration that would lead to a long term project, where to complete design process will be respected.

work_histories.title: Booking panel Designer
work_histories.description:
We are seeking an UI/UX designer to be a part of our team for developing a logistics management PWA. The project is ongoing and long term, but part time. Other projects could lead to full time engagement in the future.

The main user group of the app are the truck drivers so the approach is mobile first, but for other user groups as logistics planners for example, also desktop layouts are needed.

The app is very data intensive so understanding of data visualisation and master-detail approach are essential. The main goal of the app is to provide right data easily at the right time where it is needed and gather data/actions where and when they happens so usability is very important.

As a UI/UX designer you will be working directly and closely with the business architect who defines the goals, business processes, data model and functionalities of the app. A fluent English communication is essential.

As a UI/UX designer your responsibility is to suggest best practice for data visualisation and usability. Part of the job is also to create the actual components, UI:s and prototypes of the app with Figma so a strong skillset in that area and also icon designing skills are important.

The project is ongoing so the basic modern and clean look & feel is already set. There will be a lot of features and functionalities to be designed though.

If you decide to apply, please provide examples of similar projects and your thoughts about your approach and principals for designing such a data intensive, but user friendly apps,

work_histories.title: Looking for Figma Designer to spruce up Mobile UI draft
work_histories.description:
Hi, we are Layman, a Legaltech startup social enterprise. 

Request: We are finishing up our UI/UX design project for our mobile app. We have a large team of interns who like to get started coding ASAP. We started on a template for the Mobile UI project and would like a designer to come in and complete the project. 

Price: The project will be priced based on the estimated time to complete, the designer's average pricing, and the designer's experience and ability. Will be paid per hour for work completed to our satisfaction, so you must keep a log. 

Scope: Designers from all around the world who are responsive, timely, and English-proficient are welcome. 

Preferences: We love young, scrappy, ambitious workers who are looking to prove themselves in a field with bold and avant-garde work. While this is not a contract to hire, we will remember your workmanship for future projects. We will make our choice based on hour similar your design portfolio is to our visual brand, your experience with designing social media apps and Figma, competitive pricing, and how soon you can start.

The ability to capture our branding and design inspiration will be greatly appreciated. 


What's necessary:

- Please add flows, hyperlinks, auto-layout, and interactions to the project so that it can work as an interactive prototype and can be quickly transferred into AWS code. 
- Please add scrollability, framing, and animations where necessary.
- Please add branding and assets to the project (they have already been created) 
- Finish the development and styling of all input fields. 
- Style and brand all buttons wherever necessary.
- Retain finished elements as components, styles, and in the library for further use. 
- Ensure design continuity, coherence, and intuitiveness wherever possible, and add additional screens if necessary (unlikely).

Time to start: ASAP. 

To apply: Please include your desired pricing, any portfolios you have, and when you can start. 

Thanks.
